hymnTitle: Now that the daylight  fills the sky
hymnContent:
Zvino zuva rabudazve
Tinomukimbira Mwari
Kuti mumabasa ese
Namazwi atichengete. .


Ndimi dzedu ngadzirege
Kutuka nokunyepazve
Maziso ngaachengetwe
Kune ruchiva rwepasi.


Mwoyo yedu ichenurwe,
Pfungwa dzedu dzinatsirwe;
Zvitadzo zvenyama yedu
Zvikundwe ngekuzviramba.


Ndizvo tapedza mabasa
Nousiku huchisvika,
Tichatenda Mwari wedu
Ngekuti watichengeta.


Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,
Mbiri kunoMukorore,
Avo pamwe naye Mweya
Tinoombera narini. Amen.

hymnTitle: O Jesu, Lord of life and  grace
hymnContent:
Jesu Tenzi une tsitsi
Kupenya kwaMwari Baba,
Tsime rokupenya kwedi
Uya zuva rokudenga.


Zuva rorudorweDenga
Uya mukupenya kwako;
Udire papfungwa dzedu
Ruveneko rwoMweya.


Ndizvo ngatipiwetsitsi
Tiimbe mbiri yaBaba.
Tipiwe simba, kuzoti
Tisaputsike narini.


Basa redurinatsirwe;
Zvirunziro ngazvidzingwe;
Nzira yedu ngaikotswe;
Ngatipiwe rusimbiro.


Rudavirongarutonge
Miviri yedu nepfungwa.
Tirege kunyepa kwese,
Tigare norunyararo.


Ndizvo ngatifarenhasi,
Tine pfungwa dzakachena,
Rudaviro ruchipenya;
Mweya isine zvitadzo.


Mbiri kuna MwariBaba
Mbiri kuno Mukorore,
NokuMweya Unoyera,
Zvino napanguva dzese. Amen.

hymnTitle: Glory to thee who safe hast kept
hymnContent:
NDINOTENDABaba wangu
Wandimutsa musi uno;
Ndipe ruveneko rwako
Apo ndimuke mukufa.


Chipikondinotsidzazve,
Ndisunungure zvitadzo.
Chengeta pfungwa norudo.
Mweya wang’uzadzwe ndiwe.


Tungamidzapfungwa dzangu
Nebasa namazwi nhasi,
Kuti simba rangu rese
Rizope mbiri kunewe.


Tunhidza Mwari mese
Mutunhidze zvisikwa,
Mutunhidzei Ngerosi,
Baba, Mukorore, Mweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: New  every morning is the love
hymnContent:
Rudo rwako rwaoneswa
Ngekuti tamuka nhasi;
Watichengeta usiku
Watipa upenyu hutsva.

 

Apo tiri kunamata
Tinoona tsitsi itsva,
Zvitadzo zvinobviswazve
Tipiwe pfuma dzaMwari.

 

Kuti tichiedza tese
Kuyerisa basa rese,
Mwari achatipa zvipo
Zvokupa semipereko.

 

Mabasa emisi yese
Anotipa nzira yedu
Yokuzviramba , nenzira
Yokusvika kuna Mwari.

 

Mwari ngerudo rukuru
Tigadzirire Kudenga;
Misi yese tibatsire
Kutevera Mukorore

hymnTitle: My Father, for another night
hymnContent:
NDINOKUDZA Zita rako
Baba unodiwa,
Ngeusiku hwakanaka
Nokufara nhasi.

 

Ndinozvipa kunewezve
Mangwanani ano,
Kuti ndikufadze nhasi
Murugaro rwangu.

 

Mupfungwa nomumazano
Mumazwi nebasa;
Ndipe kuti ndikukudze,
NeZita raJesu.

 

Pamusana pake ndateta
Ndigashire Baba;
Nditungamire ngetsitsi

Mune nzira dzako

hymnTitle: May the grace of Christ our Saviour
hymnContent:
GRASIA raKristu Tenzi wedu
Norudo rwaMwari Baba,
Nokuwadzana kwoMweya zve,
Ngazvive panesu tese.

 

Ndizvo tigare muSangano
RaMwari nehama dzedu
Kuti tisvike kuumambo
Hwavatsvene nengerosi.

hymnTitle: Come, Holy Ghost, who ever one
hymnContent:
Uya Mweya Unoyera
Mumwe naBaba noMwana,
Upinde mumwoyo yedu,
Uite tese tiyere.

 

Ngemasimba edu ese
Ngatikudze Mbiri yako.
Tapidza mwoto mumwoyo
Kuti vamwe vatapidzwe.

 

Tinzwe Baba une simba
Pamusana paJesu Kristu,
Anogara akadaro

Newe naiye Mweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: Awake, my soul, and with the sun
hymnContent:
Hezvo muka mweya wangu
Penya upenye sezuva
Sezuva shandawo newe
Usati wavakudoka.

 

Chengetai hana dzenyu
Sokuchena kwesikati
Mukukurukura kwako
Ufadze muumbi wako.

 

Tsiwa nguva wakarasa
Ubve waswerawo nhasi
Uchinyatsorongedzera
Zuva guru rokutongwa.

 

Ukamirira mangwana
Ungaone wanonoka
Onei waringisana
Nechiso chinotyisisa.

 

Semiranzi inopenya
Upenyewo zvakadaro
Uchivenekera vamwe
Kumusha kwako kudenga.

 

Tunhidza Mwari mese
Mutunhidzei zvisikwa,
Mutunhidzei Ngerosi,
Baba, Mukorore, Mweya.Amen.

hymnTitle: O Trinity, most blessed  Light
hymnContent:
A! Utatu hunoyera,
A! Uhumwe hune simba,
Zvino zuva radokazve,
Venekera mwoyo yedu.

 

Mangwanani namanheru
Tinoimba tinamate,
Mwoyo yedu nemiromo
Zvikutunhidze narini.

 

Tinzwe Baba unesimba
Pamsana paJesu Kristu,
Anogara akadaro
Newe naiye Mweya. Amen

hymnTitle: Abide with me
hymnContent:
Gara neni usikuhwasvika
Kwane dima, Tenzi, garaneni;
Vamwe vabatsirivandisiya,
Mubatsiri wedu, garaneni.

 

Zuva roupenyurichadoka,
Rufaro rwepasirwuchapera;
Ndinoona zvesezvichivunda,
Usingapinduki, garaneni.

 

Zuva rese ndibatsireTenzi,
Tsitsi dzakongadzikunde Satan
Hakuna mumwemutungamiri;
Usiku nemisi, garaneni.

 

Handityi mhanduIweuripo;
Kana mudambudzohandichemi.
Kufa nenguvandichazvikunda,
Ndichiri mukundi uineni.

 

Panguva yokufa,Muponisi,
Rega ndione Muchinjikowako.
Uveneke nzira yoKudenga
M’upenyu, mukufa, garaneni.

hymnTitle: O Saviour Lord, to thee we pray
hymnContent:
TINONAMATA kunewe
M’ponisi wavanhu vese;
Watichengeta nyamusi
Tichengetezve usiku.

 

Chiva petyo nesu Tenzi
Uponise vanhu vako;
Ubvise zvitadzo zvedu
Tivenekere mudima.

 

Mweya yedu kana mwoyo
Isabatwe ndiSatan;
Yerisa miviri yedu
Kuti timuke mangwana
Tine mwoyo yakachena.

 

Mbiri kunaMwari Baba
Mbiri kuno Mukorore,
Mbiri kuno Munyaradzi,
Mwari Mweya Unoyera.Amen

hymnTitle: As  now the sun's declining rays
hymnContent:
Sezvo maranzi ezuva
Ava kuperazve,
Ndizvo upenyuhweduwo
Hwakundosipera.

 

Tenzi wakatambanudza
Manja paM’chinjiko;
Tigumbatidze pakufa
Mumanja amweyo.

 

Mbiri kunaMwari Baba,
Mbiri kunaJesu,
NoMweya Unoyera
Zvino nhambwe dzese. Amen.

hymnTitle: Sun of my Soul, thou Saviour dear
hymnContent:
ZUVA rangu Muponisi
Hakuna dima uri’po
Makore asadzitire
Kuzoti ndisakuone.

 

Ndisati ndarara nhasi
Ndipe pfungwa dzakanaka;
Pfungwa dzokugara kwangu
Narini newe kudenga.

 

Gara neni zuva rese,
Ndanyorova, ndiri ndega.
Gara neni usikuzve,
Ndega ndingazese kufa.

Kuti aripo Mukristu
Uyo anyangadza nhasi,
Muponisi une simba
Muitise apinduke.

 

Uchengete vanorwara,
Ukomborere varombo
Ngepfuma dzako dzomutsa
Unyaradze vanochema.

 

Tikomborere mangwana
Tisati tavamba basa
Kuti tifambe munzira
Iri kuenda kudenga

hymnTitle: Before the ending of the day
hymnContent:
MUSI usati wapera
Tateta Musiki wedu,
Tikotse ngemutsa wako
Tichengete takarara.

 

Tisatambudzwe muhope
Ngekufunga zvakaipa;
Tidzingire mhandu yedu,
Tisabatwe ngechitadzo.

Tinzwe, Baba, une simba
Pam’sana paJesu Kristu,
Anogara akadaro
Newe naiye Mweya.Amen.

hymnTitle: Glory to thee, my God, this night
hymnContent:
NDINOKUTUNHIDZA Mwari,
Izvo wandikotsa nhasi:
Ndichengete, Mambo wangu,
Ngesimba rako usiku.

 

Dzima zvitadzo zvanhasi
Pamsana poMwana wako;
Ngandiende kundorara
Ndafarirana nevese.


Undidzidzise kugara
Kuzoti ndisatye kufa;
Ndidzidzise kufa kuti
Ndimukezve pakuguma.

.

Ndipe hope dzakanaka
Kuti mweya uzorore,
Hope dzinondisimbisa
Kukufadza pakumuka.

 

Kuti hope dzichiramba,
Ndipe pfungwa dzokudenga;
Ndisatambudzwe usiku
Ngerimwe simba redima.

 

Tunhidzai Mwari mese
Mutunhidzei zvisikwa;
Mutunhidzei Ngerosi
Baba, Mwana, naye Mweya.

Amen.

hymnTitle: Hail, gladdening Light
hymnContent:
TINOKUDZA iwe zuva redu
Uri kubuda kubva kunaBaba;
Kupenya kwokupenya,
Kristu Tenzi Unoyera.

 

Zuva repasi riri kudoka zvino,
Mwenje yamadeko yaoneka,
Tikuddze Baba, Mukorore,
Newe Mweya Unoyera.


Ifaniro yedu kukuimbira Iwe,
Panzvimbo dzese napanguva dzese:
Mwari waMwari, tsime roupenyu hwedu,
Pasi ngapatunhidze Tenzi zvino narini.

hymnTitle: Now the day is over
hymnContent:
Kwavazve kusvipa,
Kune nyenyedzi;
Dzinorara zvino
Mhuka neshiri

Jesu ndakuteta,
Ngadzizorore;
Ngechikomborero
Chako usiku.

 

Chengeta vapwere
Uponisezve
Vanhu vapanyanza
Mupfumvu dzese.

Unyaradze vese
Vari munhamo;
Kune venyangadzi
Bvisa mazano

Hondo dzengerosi
Ngadzitumirwe,
Kuti dzindikotse,
Ngemapapiro.

 

Ndizvo mangwanani
Ngandimukezve,
Ngekufara kwazvo,
Kwapiwa ndiwe.

Mbiri kunaBaba,
NokunaKristu,
Mbirizve kunewe
Mwari Mweya.Amen.

hymnTitle: The day thou gavest, Lord, is ended
hymnContent:
ZUVA ramatipa rapera.
Dima rinodzika zvino
Mangwanani nziyo taimba
Yerisa zororo redu.

 

Sangano renyu harirari
Nyika ichiona mwenje
Richitarisa kwese kwese
Pasina kuzororazve.

 

Kunyika dzese nezvitsuwa.
Zuva rimwe richiuya
Minamato hainyarari
Nokukurumbidzwa kwenyu.

 

Zuva renyu riri kumutsa
Hama dzokumadokera
Miromo yese inoita
Mabasa enyu anzike.

Ndzizvo Tenzi umambo hwenyu
Hauzoperi senyika
Umambo hwenyu hunokura
Zvisikwa zvese zvikudze.

hymnTitle: On this day, the first of days
hymnContent:
MUSI uno weSondo
Tinotunhidza Baba,
Tenzi wepasi pese
Wakasika kupenya.

 

Nhasi’no Tenzi Jesu
Wakakurira kufa;
Mweya wakauya
Somwoto unopenya.

 

Nhasi rudo rukuru
Ngarutonge mumwoyo;
Tinatse kutunhidza
Mwari mupi w’upenyu.

Mwari wakandiita
Mufananidzo wako;
Ndidzidzise ngerudo
Ndipe ndifunge sewe.

 

Jesu ngandife sewe
Ndirege kunyangadza;
Nhasi ngandimukezve
Ndichizvipa kunewe.

 

Mupi wezviro zvese
Mweya unodiwa;
Zvipe mbune kuneni
Ndichive rudo rwako.

 

Mwari Mumwe Utatu,
Gara mumwoyo wangu;
Unozvipa kuneni
Ngandizvipe kunewe.

hymnTitle: Blest Creator of the Light
hymnContent:
MUSIKI wokupenya
Unopenyisa misi,
Wakasika kupenya
Pakuvamba kwepasi.

 

Wakasika dimazve
Kuti rive usiku.
Dima riri kusvika,
Tinzwe ngemutsa wako.

 

Tisarase nemhosva
Nzira yedu kudenga;
Tisabatwe ngepfungwa
Dzakaipa dzepasi.

 

Asi tisimudzirwe
Kudenga kune pfuma;
Ticheniswe ngetsitsi,
Nokuvenga zvitadzo.

Baba, tinzwe pam’sana
PoMukorore wako;
Uyo tinotunhidza,
Pamwe naye Mweyazve.Amen

hymnTitle: Lo! He comes with clouds decsending
hymnContent:
IYE wakafira vanhu
Achadzika ane mbiri
Vatsvene vakafa vese
Vachauya naye Mambo
Areruya,
Kristu achadzikazve.

 

Vanhu vese vachaona
Mbiri yake inotyisa.
Avo vakamutengisa,
Nokubaya Tenzi wavo,
Vachachema,
Vachazoona Mambo

.

Madzvadzi enhamo yake
Achaonwa ane mbiri;
Achakudzwa nguva dzese,
Ndivo vakaponiswa.
Vachafara,
Kuona Muponisi.

 

Ngatikuombere tese
Pachigaro choumambo,
Kristu tora simba rese
Tonga pasi narini.
Areruya,
Mambo wezviro zvese.

hymnTitle: Creator of the starry height
hymnContent:
TENZI wakasika denga,
Kupenya kwavanhu vako
Jesu Muponisi wedu,
Inzwa minamato yedu.

 

Zvo wakange une nyasha,
Pana vanhu vane mhosva,
Wakaponisa mukufa
Ngezvipo zvetsitsi dzako.

 

Izvo nguva yakasvika,
Iwe ngesimba norudo
Wakasunungura pasi
Ngekubarwa ndiMaria.

 

Zvino vese
Zita rako rine mbiri;
Zita rako rine mbiri;
Zvese zvedenga nepasi
Zvinokubvuma saMambo.

 

Takuteta Muponisi
Uchatonga pakuguma,
Tikotse, tigere pano
Muzano remhandu yedu.

 

Ngatipe zvino narini
Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,
Mbiri kunoMukorore,
Naye Mweya Unoyera. Amen.

hymnTitle: On Jordan’s bank the Baptist’s cry
hymnContent:
MUBABATIDZI paJordan
Ari kusima masoko;
Izwai ‘zvo anoreva,
“Mambo Mukuru wasvika.”

 

Bvisai zvitadzo zvese,
Chenisai mwoyo yenyu;
Ngaive umba dzaMwari
Dzinodadza kushanyirwa.”

Ndiwe Tenzi Muponisi,
Shangu yedu, tuso redu;
Tisine tsitsi tinofa
Samaruva akauna.

 

Ponisa vatenda Tenzi,
Sunungura vanyangadzi,
Veneka ngembiri yako,
Uite zvese zvinake.

 

Mbiri ngaive kunewe,
M’ponisi wavanhu vese;
Mbiri kunaMwari Baba
Naye Mweya Unoyera.Amen.

l

hymnTitle: O heavenly Word, eternal Light
hymnContent:
IWE Izwi roKudenga
Wakaberekwa ndiBaba,
Wakabarwa pasi pano
Kubatsira vanhu vako.

 

Vhenekera mwoyo yedu
Tizadze nerudo rwako;
Kuti, tadaidzwa ndiye,
Tirase zviro zvenhando.


Apo unozouyazve
Kuzotonga vanhu vese;
Vanyangadzi vachidzingwa,
Vamwe vachakomborerwa.

Tisarase pakuguma
Pam’sana pemhosva dzedu
Tiite tikudisise,
Navatsvene vako vese.

 

Mbiri kunaMwari Baba
Mbiri kunoMukorore
Naye Mweya Unoyera,
Zvino napanguva dzese.Amen.

hymnTitle: O come, O come, Emmanuel
hymnContent:
UYA, uya, Emanueri
Uponise varanda vako
Vanochemera pasi pano
Kuuya kwaMwariMwana.
Farai ! Farai ! Emmanueri
Achazouya kwamuri

 

Uya, uya, Tsvimbo yaJese
Sunungura vanhu vako;
Vakabatwa ndiSatani
Uvape mukundo parufu.

 

Haiwa, uya, Mambakwedza
Unyaradze mwoyo yedu;
Udzinge mibvuri yokufa,
Nokuuya kwako pano.

 

Uya, chipfigo chaDavidi,
Uzurure denga kunesu;
Tikotse panzira yedu,
Upfige nzira isiyo.


Uya, uya, Tenzi weSimba
Wakapa kare mitemo
Kuna vanhu vaIsraeri
MuUmambo hunotyisa.

hymnTitle: Hark ! a thrilling voice is sounding
hymnContent:
IZWI guru rokudenga
Rakanzwika richiti,
“Imi vana vokupenya,
Bvisai zvakaipa.”

 

Ndizvo isu tapepuka,
Ngatiteerere Tenzi;
Iye Jesu zuva redu,
Anopenya panesu.

 

Iye, Nyenye yechitsidzo,
Ino rusununguro,
Ngatiende ngekusuva,
Kundomuchingamidza.

Kuti pakuuya kwake
Kwechipiri kutonga,
Tiswendere kunaiye.
Ngebanza nokushinga.

Mbiri nako kutunhidza
Ngazvipiwe kunaiye,
KunaBaba, Mukorore
NoMweya narini zve.Amen.

hymnTitle: Hark the glad sound ! the Saviour
hymnContent:
A ! INZWAI muponisi
Ari kuswendera !
Gadzirai umba yake
Mukati memwoyo.


Anopa rusununguko
Kuna vanyangadzi
Vakabatwa ndiSatani
Ngemajoti ake.


Anozurura zambara
Rapfigwa nedare;
Ndizvozvo imbai mese
Kundomutambira.


Anouya kubatsira
Mwoyo ineshungu,
Kurapa hosha dzoMweya
Akazvirereka.


Muchinda worunyararo
Tinokutambira
Ngezviimbo nokufara
Pakuuya kwako.


Zita rako rakanaka
Ngarikomborerwe
NaBaba noMunyaradzi
Zvino nariniwo.Amen.

hymnTitle: O come, all ye faithful
hymnContent:
UYAI Makristu
Nokufara kwazvo
Uyai, uyai, muBetrehema;
Kuzomuona, Mambo wengerosi,
Uyai tiombere,
Uyai tiombere,
Uyai tiombere,
Kristu Tenzi.

 

Mwari waMwari,
Kupenya kwokupenya
Haashori nhumbu yemhandara.
NdiMwariwedu, uyo wakabarwa.

 

Onai vafudzi,
Avo vadaidzwa,
Vanosvika ngerudo rukuru.
Ngatitevere, isu, ngekufara.

 

Avo vazivi
Vari kupa zvipo,
Rusenzi, nendarama, nemura;
Ngatitevere, isu, ngekufara.

 

Uri murombo
Ngepam’sana pedu;
Tinodisa dai tifungatire,
Iwe ngerudo, unotida kwazvo.

 

Imbai ngerosi
Pemberai kwazvo,
Imbai mese mugere kudenga;
Mbiri kuna Mwari ari kum’soro.

 

Tachingamidza
Wakabarwa nhasi,
Jesu, mbiri ipiwe kunewe;
Izwi raBaba, zvino rava munhu.

hymnTitle: While shepherds watched
hymnContent:
VAFUDZI vari mukufudza hwai usiku
Ngerosi inopenya yakadzika ngembiri,

 

Ichiti “Musatye”, ‘zvo vakanga vave kutya,
“Ndaunza kufara kunemi navanhu vese.

 

“Nhasi muBetrehema, kwaberekwa Kristu
M’ponisi wedu Tenzi worudzi rwaDavidi.”

 

“Mudanga rengombe imi muchaona Tenzi,
Uyo Mwana muduku wakarara mundiro.”

 

Ngerosi zhinji dzakasanganira naiyo
Kuvirikidza Mwari ngekufara, dzichiti:

 

“Mbiri ngaive kunaMwari uri kudenga;
Pasi pano runyararo kuna vanhu vese.”

hymnTitle: Hark ! the herald Angels sing
hymnContent:
NGEROSI dzinoimba
Kukudza Mambo mutsva.
Rugare ruri pasi
Vanhu vasunungurwa.
Farai ndudzi dzese
Pamwe navo kundenga
Revai ngerosi,
Kristu wabarwa nhasi.
Ngerosi dzinoimba
Mbiri kuMambo mutsva


Kristu ngaatunhidzwe
Kristu Tenzi wekare;
Onai zvino wasvika
Dangwe romusikana;
Ngatione Umwari
Hwavandiswa munyama;
Anogara kunesu
Jesu, Mwari anesu.


Kwaziwai Muchinda !
Zuva rokururama,
Anounza upenyu
Norujeko kunesu;
Achisiya mbiri yake,
Wabarirwa kuponisa
Vanhu vese vepasi,
Kupa upenyu hutsva.

hymnTitle: O Christ, Redeemer of our race
hymnContent:
KRISTU Muponisi wedu,
Kupenya kwaMwari Baba,Iwe wakange unaye
Pasi risati rasikwa

Uri ruveneko rwedi
Mudima rezvakaipa;
Inzwa minamato yese
Pasi pese musi uno.

 

Tondera Tenzi wetsitsi,
Kuti wakatiponisa
Ngekuitwa munhu kare
NdiMaria wakachena.

 

Kuti zuva richibuda
Nhas’uno panyika dzese;
Vanhu vese vanotizve
“Wakatiponisa wega.”

 

Wakatumirwa ndiBaba.
Kudaidza vana vake;
Denga nepasi nenyanza
Zvinokudza rudo rwake.

Nesu tinofara nhasi.
Takasunungurwa ndiye;
Tinoimba rwiyo rutsva
Izvo wakabarwa nhasi.

 

Mbiri ngaive kunewe.
Wakabarwa ndiMaria;
Mbiri kunaMwari Baba,
Naye Mweya Unoyera.Amen.

hymnTitle: Of the Father’s love begotten
hymnContent:
PASI risati ravapo
Wakabarwa ndiBaba,
Ndimavambo namagumo,
Wakazvisika zvese
Zviripo, zviro zvekare,
Nezviro zvichavapo
Zvigare zvakadaro.

 

Takapfumiswa zvikuru
Ngekuberekwa kwake,
Izvo Maria Mhandara
Akabereka Tenzi;
Mwana M’ponisi wavanhu
Wakaonekwa pasi,
Zvigare zvakadaro.

Ndiye, wazivi vekare
Vakamukudza vese:
Vaprofiti vanoyera
Vakataura ndiye;
Ari kuuya, zvisikwa
Ngazvitunhidze Tenzi;
Zvigare zvakadaro.

 

Denga rese, virikidza;
Ngerosi tunhidzai;
Zviro zvese kotamai,
Mukudze Mwari wedu;
Vanhu vese vari pasi
Ngavaimbe pamwepo,
Zvigare zvakadaro.

 

Varume navakomana
Vese vakuimbire;
Vakadzi navasikana
Vapindure vafare;
Nziyo dzavo ngadzikwire
Nezvitendo zvomwoyo,
Zvigare zvakadaro

 

Kuna Kristu, kuna Baba,
Nokunewe Mweya,
Nziyo nezvitendo zvese
Ngazvipiwe narini,
Nokukurira kwese;
Zvigare zvakadaro.
Mbiri huru nokukudzwa

hymnTitle: In the bleak mid-winter
hymnContent:
KAREKARE chando chakachena kwazvo.
Mhepo yakahwinya, ichitonhoresa.
Karekare kwazvo, Tenzi Mwari wedu
Wakabarwa pasi, kuponesa vanhu.

 

Danga harikwani Tenzi Mwari wedu,
Iye achatonga zvese zvakasikwa;
Asi danga duku umo akabarwa
Rakakwana Jesu, Tenzi Mwari wedu.

 

Kudenga ngerozi dzinomuombera;
Pasi wakaamwa zamu raMaria.
Kudenga, ngerozi dzinomutunhidza;
Pasi wakakudzwa ngebemhe nengombe.

 

Hationi apo hondo dzengerozi
Asi San’Josefa navafudzi basi;
Mai wake ega achitsvoda mwana
Nokumuombera Mwari wake wedi.

 

Chii ndingakupe Jesu mudikani?
Ndinoshaya nyenye, chipo chavafudzi,
Zvipo zvaVazivi zvese handinazvo,
Asi ndinokupa mwoyo wangu wese.

hymnTitle: Once in Royal David’s city
hymnContent:
KARE kwakamira danga
Mumusha waDavidi;
Umo mai akaisa
Kamwana mune ngombe
Maria ndiye Mai,
Jesu Kristu kamwana.

 

Wakasiya mbiri yake,
Mwari wedu, naTenzi,
Wakabarwa pasi pano
Mudanga rezvipfuwo.
Ona, M’ponisi wedu
Wakagara murombo.

 

Paupwere hwake hwese
Wakadisa Maria;
Misi yese wakamunzwa
Uyo wakamurera.
Imi vana edzai
Kufanana naiye.


Wakapa muenzaniso
Worugaro kunesu,
Waichema, waiseka
Waiita sesuwo,
Anosongana nesu
Munhamo nokufara.

 

Pakuguma ticham’ona
Iye Mambo worudo;
Uyo Mwana wakatiwa
Ari Mwari mukuru.
Kuti tichitevera
Tichasvika Kudenga.

 

Hatichamuoni apo
Pane danga rengombe
Tichaona a’ne mbiri
Achikudzwa kudenga.
Apo vachava naye
Vana vake vazhinji.

hymnTitle: As with gladness men of old
hymnContent:
1 JESU Tenzi Muponisi,

Tese ngatimutunhidze nokumuda kwazvo

2 Wakafira isu tese-----

3 Wakafira isu tese-----

4 Pagomo reKarvari------

5 Zvinyangadzo zvedu zvese---

6 Zvakatakurwa naiye----

7 Akazvitenga neropa------

8 Mwoyo wake wakachena-----

Nhungamiri. JESU Kristu Jesu Kristu, wakaberekwa
Vanhu. Wakabarwa
N.TinofaraV.Areruya – wakabarwa


N. Ona vafudzi ona vafudzi, vari kurara V. Wakabarwa
N.TinofaraV. Areruya – Wakabarwa.


N. Ona ngerosi ona ngerosi, dzakaonekwa V. Wakabarwa,
N.TinofaraV. Areruya – Wakabarwa.


N.Runyararo runyararo, ngaruve pasi.V.Wakabarwa.
N.TinofaraV. Areruya – Wakabarwa.


N.Vakaenda vakaenda kundomuonaV.Wakabarwa.
N,TinofaraV.Areruya – Wakabarwa.


N.Vakaona vakaona, Mai noMwana V.Wakabarwa,
N.TinofaraV.Areruya – wakabarwa.


N.Vakapfugama vakapfugama, kumunamataV. Wakabarwa
N.TinofaraV. Areruya – wakabarwa.


N.Ngatiungane ngatiungane, tinamatewo V.
Wakabarwa,
N.TinofaraV. Areruya – Wakaberekwa.

KWAKATI panguva yokutonga kwaHerodi Mambo,
Tese ngatitunhidze Mwari, tese ngatitunhidzenokumuombera

 

Vafudzi vagere pamwoto vachifudza hwai usiku--

Mukupenya Ngerosi yakati,Musatye, ndaunza rufaro kune pasi --

 

Nhasi muBeterehema kwaberekwa KristuMuponisi wedu --

 

Iye Mwana unoyera kwazvowakabarwa mundiro yezvipfuwo --

 

Ngerosi dzaimba Mbiri kumusoro,rudo kuna vanhu, runyararo pasi --

 

Iye ari ruveneko rwedi mudima rezvitadzozvedu --

Wakatumwa ndiBaba kuzodaidza isu vana vake--

 

Denga, pasi nenyanza zvinokudza rudo rwake--

 

Iye wakabvuma kufa kuti tione ruveneko --

 

Ngatimuimbire rwiyo rutsva ngekutifira kwake–

 

Mwari anofadzwa ngerupinduko rwedu norudaviro–

Makristu namatirai vese vari mudima vaoneruveneko –

Mwari ari kumirira vese vari mudima kuuyamusangano –

 

Ndzvo ngaanzwe minamato yedu nhasi uno narini–

IMI vana mese
Ngatiimbire,
Ngekufara kwazvo,
Mambo wabarwa.

 

Ngatichingamidze
Nerwiyo rwedu
Kristu ane mbiri;
Nhasi wabarwa.

 

Vana musatyeba
Kumuswendera,
Wakati vapwere
Ngavaunzwewo.

Muzambara warara
Mwana wedenga.
Mai anorera
Ndiye Maria.

Kumusoro kwedenga
Kune nyenyedzi.
Inopinda dzese
Kuchena kwayo.

Ngatipinde tese,
Kana tisine
Zvipo zvavamambo
Nezvavafudzi.

Anoda zvikuru
Zvipo zvavana,
Tese ngatimupe
Rudo rwomwoyo.

hymnTitle: See amid the winter snow
hymnContent:
MWANA wabarirwa isu.
Ona arimo muchando,
Nyenye inoyera kwazvo
Yakatsidzwa karekare.
Zuva rakakomborerwa !
Ngatiimbe ngekufara
Kristu arimo mudanga,
Nhasi wabarirwa isu.

 

Iye wakasika denga,
Anogara achikudzwa
Ngengerosi dzese dzese,
Arimo mudanga zvino;

Imi vanhu tiudzei
Nyaya yenyu yokufara
Ngei maregera hwai
Dziri kure pamakomo?


Apo takafudza hwai
Takaona mbiri huru
Ngerosi dzaimba kuti:
“Runyararo kuna vanhu.”

 

Jesu sheshe inoyera
Uno rudo rwashamisa
Waregera mbiri yako
Uchiuya somurombo.

Mwana wedu unodiwa
Tipe titevere Iwe
Mukutiwa nokupfava,
Rudo, tsitsi, nourombo.

hymnTitle: When Christ was born of Mary free
hymnContent:
NGUVA’YO Kristu akabarwa
MuBet’rehema, ndiMariaNgerosi
dzakaimba dzese
In excelcis gloria !


Vafudzi vakaona idzo
Dziri kupenya dzichiimba
Mwana waMwari

 

Wauya mambo Muponisi
Sezvakanyorwa mumatsamba.
Ndizvo tiimbe urwo rwiyo:

M’ponisi, tipe tsitsi dzako
Dzitiunze tese kudenga
Apo tiimbe urwo rwiyo.

hymnTitle: Christians, awake
hymnContent:
IMI Makristu mese pepukai
Tenzi Jesu wakabarwa nhasi,
Ngatiombere rudo rwakadai
Taudzwa ngehondo dzengerosi
Nadzo soko rakatanga pas
Mwari wakabarwa neMhandara.


Ngerosi yati kuna vafudzi
Ndine masoko okufarisa
Muponisi wabarirwa imi
Nendudzi dzese dzeiri pasi,
Chitsidzo chakapiwa kunesu
Chaitwa nhasi ndiMwari wedu


Soko rapera: ndipo ngerosi
Dzese dzaimbisa rwiyo rutsva
Kukudza rudo rwatiponisa
Denga rafara rese ngerwiyo:
Mbiri kumusoro kuna Mwari
Norugare pasi kune vanhu.


Avo Vafudzi vamhanya kwazvo
Vasvika Beterehema uko
Apo vaona Mwana M’ponisi
NaMai nomureri Josefa:
Ndizvo vaombera Tenzi Jesu
Nokuudza soko kune vanhu.

 

Ngatichengete mumwoyo yedu
Rudo urwu rwaoniswa vanhu,
Ngatikudze Mwana waMaria
Kubva mudanga kuMuchinjiko;
Tinobatsirwa ndiTenzi Jesu
Dakara tichisvika kudenga.

hymnTitle: Angels from the realms of glory
hymnContent:
IMI ngerosi makabva
Munzvimbo yokupenya,
Munoparidzira kuti
Kristu wakaberekwa,
Omberai,
Kristu wakaberekwa.

 

Vafudzi! Muri kugara
Musango nousiku,
Munopiwa chioniso,
Kuti Mwari anesu:

 

Vazivi pamabvazuva
Muchirinda ngekutya;
Kuchasvika garegare,
Tenzi wenyu paumba;

 

Chita chese chekudenga,
Imbai ndwiyo dzenyu,
Musimudze mazwi ese,
Kuna Mwari Mukuru;

hymnTitle: Shepherd in the fields abiding
hymnContent:
VANHU vachifudza hwai
Kunze paUsiku
Vakanzwa ngerosi zhinji
Dzichiimba rwiyo.
Mbiri kumusorosoro.


Vakatya zvikuru kwazvo
Vachiona hondo
Yengerosi dzokudenga
Dzichifarisisa

 

Farisai, musatyeba,
Kristu aberekwa
Ndiye mwana wokudenga,
Uko Beterehema.

 

Uko dzinogara ngombe
Kune kakomana
Ndiye mwana wokudenga,
Auya kunesu

 

Vakaenda kom’ombera
Vakam’virikidza:
Vakacherechedza Mwari,
Mwari ava nyama.


Zvino Josefa naMaria
Pamwe navafudzi
Vakacherechedza Mwari
Ngatimukudzise

hymnTitle: Silent night
hymnContent:
PAUSIKU hunoyera,
Kune nyika iri kure,
Yakajeka nyenyedzi yaTenzi
Chioniso chaMwari wediko,
Iyo Tenzi abarwa.
Iyo kwabarwa Mesiya.

 

Baba wake akashama,
Mai wake akafara:
Mwana wavo M’ponisi wavanhu,
Akakudzwa zvikuru ndiMwari,
Pasi pese farai!
Mwari azotishanyira.


Mune danga radzo ngombe
Azobarwa Mwana mutsva,
Ndiye Mwana waMwari mupenyu,
Ndiye rudo rwaBaba kunesu,
Ndiye mudi wavanhu
Nomudikani wevese.

hymnTitle: Away in a manger
hymnContent:
IPAPO mudanga muBeterehema
Jesu somwana anorara pauswa
Maria mai wake agree petyo
NaJosefa muchengeti wavo vese.

 

Maiva nengombe imo mudangamo
Asi mwana haatyiswi kudziona
Ngekuti uyu mwana musiki wadzo
Nomusiki weduwo navanhu vese.

 

Vafudzi vakauya kuona mwana,
Vakabva kumafuro avo usiku
Ngerosi kudenga dzakavirikidza
Zvo Muponisi akanga aberekwa.

 

Ngatione vatsvene Beterehema;
Ngatirangarire Jesu ari petyo

 

Akabarwa kare paBeterehema
Achagarawo nesu nhasi, narini

hymnTitle: I know a plant – it springeth
hymnContent:
Nhungamiri.ZVINO ratunga gwenzi;
Vanhu.Baba ngaatunhidzwewo.
Rabva mudzinde kwaro;
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo.
Remudzi wasaJese’ngeizwi raIsaya;
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo.



MuprofitiIsaya
Baba ngaatunhidzwewo
Wakafembera iro
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo
Gwenzi rinonzi Roziri richazobereka
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo

 

Mutiyo ndiMaria
Baba ngaatunhidzwewo
Wakabara Ruva Jesu
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo
Ona Karuva aka kamwana kakapfava
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo


Kunyika inoyera
Baba ngaatunhidzwewo
Kwakange kune chando
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo
Usiku hwati zvi Mwari wakava munhu
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo.


Kwakange kune chando
Baba ngaatunhidzwewo
Usiku hwakasvipa
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo
Ngerosi dzoti ngwee dzichiimba ngeMwana
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo


Mbiri’ ko kunaMwari
Baba ngaatunhidzewo
Kuna Mwari kumusoro
Mwana ngaatunhidzwewo
Rugare kunesuwo ngatifare ndiJesu
Mweya ngautunhidzwewo.

hymnTitle: From the Eastern Mountains
hymnContent:
MBERI kwamakomo
Amabvazuva,
Kunosvika vanhu
Vane kuziva
Vari kuchamira
Muiro basa,
Vakatungamidzwa
Ngenyenyedzi’yo.


Ruveneko rwavo
NdiMuponisi,
Uyo wazviita
Mutungamidzi;
Anovenekera
Vanhu vekare,
Sezvo yakaita
Nyenyedzi yake


Unganisa, Tenzi,
Vakarasika;
Uvavekere
Vari panzira,
Batsira vafambi
Kuti vazhinji
Vatevere kwazvo
Iyo nyenyedzi.


Jesu, Muchengeti
Titungamidze;
Gara uchipenya
Pamsoro pedu;
Batsira vakuru
Navadukuzve,
Nava vamaJuda
Navanhu vese


Jesu, wakarara
Mukachidyiro,
Unotonga zvino
Vamambo vese;
Unganisa avo
Panzvimbo dzese
Vasakamboona
Nyenyedzi yako

 

Kuchavapo ngedi
Ndudzi dzavanhu,
Vari kutevera
Mureza wako,
Kure kumakomo
Kumusha kwavo,
Uko kusinaba
Kufa nenhamo

l

hymnTitle: Earth hath many a noble city
hymnContent:
BETEREHEMA rinopinda
Misha yese yepasi;
Tenzi wakabuda umo
Kutonga vanhu vake.


Zvo akabarwa, nyenyedzi
Yakapenya sezuva
Yakadaidzira pasi
Mwari waitwa nyama.

 

Vazivi vaMabvazuva
Vakapa zvipo zvavo.
Ona! vakapa ndarama
Norusenzi nomura.



Vakatambidza ndarama,
Kunaiye saMambo,
Rusenzi sokuna Mwari
Nomura’ zvo achafa.

 

Jesu Iwe wakakudzwa
Pakuoniswa kwako,
Mbiri ngaive kunewe,
NaBaba noMweyawo. Amen.

hymnTitle: The people that in darkness sat
hymnContent:
VANHU vaiva mudima
Vapenyiswa zvino;
Kupenya kwavhenekera
Vaiva mukufa.

 

Kuzochingamidza zuva
Ndudzi dzaungana;
Dziri kufara pamwepo
Kudana vakohwi.

 

Ngekuti dzasunungurwa;
Dzaponiswa dzese;
Dzapiwa simba rokurwa
Nezvitadzo zvese.

 

Zvo tapiwa Mukorore,
Tabarirwa Mwana;
Simba redenga nepasi
Ngerake narini.

 

Muchinda woRunyararo
NaTenzi Mugari,
Munanisi, Mureveri,
Mwari, Zita rake.

 

Umambo hwake huchava
Pamsoro pezvese,
Kutongazve noungwaru
Hazvizogumiba.

 

Tinokutondera Jesu
Nokupfava kwako,
Ugere pamwe naBaba
Naye Munyaradzi.

hymnTitle: As with gladness men of old
hymnContent:
SEZVO vazivi kare
Vakaona nyenyedzi
Ichivatungamira
Ngeruvheneko rwayo;
Ndizvo titungamirwe
Kunewe Tenzi wedu.

 

Sezvo vakatizira
Kukuona M’ponisi,
Vachikukotamira
Tenzi wepasi pese;
Ndizvo ngatichimbidze
Kutsvaka tsitsi dzako.

 

Sezvo vakapa zvipo
Zvinokosha kunewe;
Ndizvo tisingabatwi
Ngesimba rezvitadzo,
Tiunze pfuma dzedu
Kunewe Mambo wedu.

 

Jesu mazuva ese
Tichengete panzira;
Kuti pasi rapera
Tiunzwe, taponiswa,
Kumusha wokudenga
Nembiri yako huru.

 

Panyika yokudenga
Havashayi kupenya;
Iwe uri kupenya
Zuva risingadoki;
Apo tiimbe tese
Zviimbo kuna Mwari.

hymnTitle: O merciful Creator, hear
hymnContent:
TITEERERE, Musiki
Ngenyasha dzakodzo huru;
Inzwa minamato yedu
Mukutsanya uku kwedu.

 

Unoziva mwoyo yese,
Nokunyorova kwavanhu,
Tinokutsvaka ngenhamo
Tisungure ngetsitsi.

 

Tine zvitadzo zvizhinji!
Ponisa vanopinduka,
Pamsana pezita rako
Simbisa vakanyorova.

 

Tibatsire kuzviramba
Nokurega kudya kwedu,
Kuti ndizvo mweya yedu
Iponiswe muzvitadzo.

 

A! Utatu hune simba,
Mwari tinokumbirira
Ukomborere kutsanya
Ngemichero yakanaka.

hymnTitle: thou, who dost to man accord
hymnContent:
M’PONISI unopa vanhu
Zvipo zvese zvakanaka,
Mudiwa wavanhu;
Jesu tauya kunewe,
Inzwa zvikumbiro zvedu
Tiri kukutsvaka.

 

Tinoziva mhosva dzedu
Dzepfungwa, mazwi, nebasa;
Takatadza tese;
Uchenure hana dzedu,
Dzorera vanopinduka,
Uvasunungure.

 

 

Kuti uchiramba isu
Tingabatsirwe ndiani?
Iwe Muponisi:
Suka mwoyo yakasvipa,
Tambira vanochemera
Zvinyangadzo zvavo.

 

Ngekutsanya kwako kare
Wakapa muenzaniso
Mukutsanya kwedu;
Tipe tizvirambe zvino,
Ndizvo tifare pamusi
Wokumuka kwako.

 

A! Utatu Hunoyera
Tipe tsitsi dzako zvino,
Tikotse narini;
Kuti tamuka mukufa
Tikuimbire kudenga
Navatsvene vako.

hymnTitle: Forty days and Forty nights
hymnContent:
MAZUVA nousiku
Aya makumi mana
Wakaziya kugwenga
Uchirunzirwa Tenzi.

 

Wakapiswa ngezuva,
Wakatota ngebeto,
Wakagara nemhuka,
Wakatsamira mahwe.

 

Hatinzwi shungu here,
Nokurega kufara?
Titsanye tinamate
Tinzwe nhamo saiwe.

 

Satan’ achirunzira
Nyama yedu nomweya
Iwe mukundi wake
Tibatsire tikunde.

 

Ndizvo tinonyaradzwa,
Tinofadzwa zvikuru;
Ngerosi dzinopenya
Dzinobatsira isu.

 

Tichengete M’ponisi;
Tigare pedyo newe;
Tizoonekwe newe
Ngemusi wokumuka.

hymnTitle: Lord, in this thy mercy’s day
hymnContent:
NGUVA ino yenyasha
Isinati yapera,
Tinokumbira Tenzi.

 

Jesu tipe masodzi,
Utizadze ngekutya,
Tisinati tatongwa.

 

Tenzi tipiwe Mweya
Tauya pamusuo,
Usinati wapfigwa.

 

Ngeusiku hwenhamo
Ngemazwi paM’chinjiko,
Ngekuda kutifira.

 

Ngekuchemera kwako
Jerusarema kare,
Tipiwe rudo rwako.

 

Tiunze petyo newe,
Tisarasike zvino,
Tiite tikuone.

hymnTitle: Lord Jesus, think on me
hymnContent:
NDIFUNGE Tenzi Jesu,
Ndanyangadza,
Ndisuke muzvitadzo
Ngeropa rako.

 

Ndifunge Tenzi Jesu,
Ndiri wako.
Mubasa rangu rese
Undibatsire.

 

Ndifunge Tenzi Jesu,
Ndine nhamo.
Mukurwa mira petyo
Undikanire.


Ndifunge Tenzi Jesu,
Ndarasika.
Penyisa pane dima
Ndione nzira.

 

Ndifunge Tenzi Jesu,
Gara neni.
Yasvika mhandu yangu
Undiponise.


Ndifunge Tenzi Jesu,
Pakuguma.
Ndirege ndikuone
Undifarise.

MWARI wakadzika kare;
Wakauya kutifira isu vana.

 

Wakatambudzika kwazvo---

 

Baba wakamupa simba----

 

Simba rokukurira pasi------

 

Wakafira pasi pese--------


Wakagara nechiremedzo--


Wakagara nounherera----


Waifara namai wake-----

 

Ngatitende kunaMwari Baba-

 

Ngatimunamate ngekufara----

hymnTitle: The royal banners forward go
hymnContent:
1 ONA mureza waMambo,

Muchinjiko unopenya:

Apo musiki wavanhu

Akatiripira mhosva.



2. Aripo, rutivi rwake

Rwakabayiwa ngepfumo,

Kutichenura ngeropa

Rakabuda nemvurawo.



3. Izvo zvakaudzwa kare

NdiDavid zvaitwa zvino,

Kuti Mwari wakatonga;

Nokukurira pamuti.



4. Iwe muti unembiri,

Apo kwakaiswa Tenzi,

Wakapenya ngezvitsvuku

Zveropa roMuponisi.



5. Wakatsikinura tese,

Kubva muzvitadzo zvese;

Akakurira Satani

Uyo wakabata vanhu.



6. Utatu husingagumi

Vese ngavakutunhidze,

Titonge ngeMuchinjiko,

Wakatidzorera ndiwo.

hymnTitle: Sing, my tongue, the glorious battle
hymnContent:
1 IMBIRAI ndimi dzese

Kurwa kune mbiri,

Mese tunhidzai Kristu,

Ndiye Mukuriri

Muteuro paM’chinjiko,

Wakatiponisa.



2. Nguva yake yapfuura,

Yokugara nesu,

Muponisi anozvipa

Kune nhamo zhinji.

Nyenye yaroverwa zvino

Mupereko wedi.




3. Mbambo, pfumo wakorera

Minzwa nokupfirwa;

Muviri wakadurura

Mvura neRopawo.

Tsime tsvene rokugeza

Vanhu nezvisikwa.

4. Iwe Muchinjiko kwawo

Muti une mbiri;

Une ruva nomuchero

Zvinopinda zvese;

Uyo apo aturikwa

Ndiye Musikiwo.



5. Kombamisa mhandu dzako,

Muti’yo murefu;

Kuoma kwako kwekare

Ngakupfave zvino;

Ndiwe uri kutakura

Mambo wekudenga.



6. Iwe wega wakafanira

Kutsigira Tenzi;

Ndiwe vanhu vagashira

Ruponiso rwavo;

Nyenye yavazora zvino

NgeRopa rinokosha.



7. Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,

Kuno Mukorore,

Kuno Mweya Unoyera

Mumwe ngeVatatu,

Mwari ane simba rese

Agere narini. Amen.

hymnTitle: There is a fountain filled with blood
hymnContent:
1. PARUTIVI rwoM’ponisi wangu

Pakapopoma rwizi rweropa,

Vese vatadzi vanosamba’po

Vachibuda vati mbuu kuchena.


2. Mbavha yakafa paMuchinjiko

Yakashambidzwa muurwo rwizi

Neni ndisina pakati mbee,

Ndingati mbuu muna’rwo rukova.



3. Ndizvo basi ndosimbawo nazvo

Ndabva mumhaka isingaperi,

Hapachinazve nerimwe zita

Rinondifadza kupinda rake.



4. Kana ndichinge ndowokotsira

Rurimi rwangu rwanyararisa

Ndinodudza norurimi rutsva,

Ndinodudza norurimi rutsva,

Muponisi wakandinunura.

hymnTitle: From pain to pain, from woe to woe
hymnContent:
NOMWOYO ine rusuvo,

Neminhasvu inorema,

Tiri kuenda Karvari:

Ropa rake Jesu

Rinodonha pasi;

Ona nhamo yake

Nezvitadzo zvedu!

hymnTitle: All glory, laud, and honour.
hymnContent:
1. MBIRI yese kunewe

Muponisi Mambo;

Vapwere vanoimba

Hosana kunewe.


2. Mambo waIsraeri,

Mwana waDavidi,

Unouya saMambo

Muzita raTenzi.


3. Ngerosi dzokudenga

Dzinokutunhidza,

Vanhu, nezviro zvese,

Vanopindurazve.


4. Vanhu vaIsraeri

Vakapa michindwi,

Isu tinopa ndwiyo

Neminamatozve.



5. Usati waroverwa

Vakakutunhidza;

Zvino uri kudenga

Tinokuimbira.



6. Wakafadzwa ngendwiyo

Dzavanhu vekare;

Tambira ndwiyo dzedu

Mambo wakanaka.

hymnTitle: Now my soul, thy voice apraising
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA wangu imba zvino

Nyaya yoMuponisi;

Iye wakafira isu

PaMuchinjiko wake,

Wakazvipa iye mbune

Kutenga vanyangadzi.


2. Onai ari kusungwa

Kusunungura vanhu;

Ropa rako rinokosha

Riri tsime retstsi,

Mbambo dziri kusungira

Isuwo pane muti.



3. Jesu ita ropa rako

Rimwiswe vanyangadzi;

Rive ruponiso rwedu

Nokufara kudenga;
Ndizvo pasi rakatendwa
Richakukudza Tenzi.

hymnTitle: Ride on, ride on in majesty
hymnContent:
1. FAMBA muumambo hwako!

Uri pambongoro yako;

Vanhu vese vachiimba

Nemichindwi nezviimbo.


2. Famba muumambo hwako!

Kupfumvu, nhamo norufo!

Kristu mbiri yavambira

Kukunda guva neshungu.



3. Famba muumambo hwako!

Ngerosi dzese dzedenga

Dziri kusuva nyamusi

Ngepfungwa yomuteuro.



4. Famba muumambo hwako!

Dambudziko razosvika;

Baba pachigaro chake

Ari kumirira Mwana.



5. Famba muumambo hwako!

Kupfumvu, nhamo norufu!

Masure mezvo simuka

Utonge mumbiri yako.

1. 1. UNOGAMUCHIRWA zvino

PaJerusarema,

Unofamba pambongoro

Ine mhuru yayo.


2. Unogamuchirwa zvino

PaJerusarema,

Vanhu vese vachifara

Kukuona zvino


3 Unogamuchirwa zvino

PaJerusarema,

Michindwi nayo matavi

Zvapepera nhasi.

4 Unogamuchirwa zvino

PaJerusarema,

Hosana Hosana kune

Mwana waDavidi


5. Unogamuchirwa zvino

PaJerusarema,

Jesu anouya zvino

Muzita raMwari.

hymnTitle: Glory be to Jesus
hymnContent:
1. MBIRI kuna Jesu! Iye munhamo

Wakapira Ropa, kutiponisa.


2. Ropa rinoyera, rinopa tsitsi

Ritipe upenyu, tinoritenda


3. Mbiri kune Ropa, zvino narini

Rakabvisa kufa, richiponisa.


4. Ropa raEberi, rinotsivira;

Ropa rake Jesu, rinoponisa



5. Mwoyo inemhosva yadirwa naro

Satan’ ari kutya, wabva panesu


6. Pasi rinofara, rinoimbisa;

Hondo dzengerosi dzinodaira.


7. Imbisai mese, kwidzai ndwiyo,

Tunhidzai mese Ropa raJesu.

1 PO Jesu akaroverwa

Pakati pavatadzi

Gororo paMuchinjiko

Rakati kuna Jesu

Zvibatsirewo iwe

Uponise nesuwo.


2. Imwe mbavha yopindura,

“Rega tatadza tose;

Uyu haana kutadza;

Ndimudzidzisi wedu;

Rega kumbomutuka

Munhu mutsvene uyu.



3. Jesu ishe ndakuteta

Munditonderewo

M’ushe hwenyu hwokudenga

Apo munosvikamo.”

Jesu akapindura,

Ndichakugashiramo.



4. Nhasi uchazova neni

Muparadesi umo;

Kana tafa pamwe chete

Tichazogara umo;

Vese vanopinduka

Vanopinda kudenga.

1. VANYANGADZI ngaticheme namasodzi outadzi.

Tinochema “Yowe! Yowe! Yowe! Yowe! Yowe! Tenzi Jesu.”

2. Tarirai, Tenzi Jesu anotongwa naPirato.

3. Tarirai, Tenzi Jesu anoenda Karvari.

4. Tarirai, Tenzi Jesu panzira waputsika.

5. Tarirai, abatsirwa naSimoni MuAfrica.

6. Tarirai, anosvika pagomo reKarvari.

7. Tarirai, anobviswa nguvo dzake zvino.

8. Tarirai, anoreva mazwi ake manomwe.

9. Tarirai, anofapamusana pedu tese.

10. Tarirai, wafa Jesu paMuchinjiko nhasi.

hymnTitle: When I survey the wondrous Cross
hymnContent:
1. NDICHIONA Muchinjiko

Apo Kristu akafira,

Pfuma yese ndicharasa

Kudada kwangu ndishore.


2. Tenzi handingazvikudzi

Asi ngeM’chinjiko wako

Zviro zvenhando zviraswe

Pamsana peRopa rako.


3. Onai nhamo norudo

Zvakadururirwa isu,

Hakuna nhamo norudo

Zvakadare pasi pano.



4. Zvipo zvese zviri pasi

Zvipo zvisingafaniri;

Rudo runoshamisisa

Rwadisisa rudo rwangu.



5. Kristu wakatiwanira

Nyasha, ngedambudzo rake.

Ngaatunhidzwe nevese

Zvino napanguva dzese.

hymnTitle: There is a green hill far away
hymnContent:
1. PAGOMO kunze kwemusha weJerusarema

Jesu wakaroverwa kutiponisa tose.

2. Hatizivi nhamo’yo akatambudzikira

Asi tese tinoziva, wakafira isu.

3. Wakafira kutiita tirurame tese,

Kutikokera kudenga ngeM’chinjiko wake.

4. Hapana munhu angasungure zvitadzo,

NdiJesu ega wakatizururira denga.

5. Wakatidisa, nesu tese ngatimudewo,

Tisimbire muropa rake nokumufadza.

hymnTitle: O come and mourn with me awhile
hymnContent:
1. UYAI zvino ticheme,

Uyai kunoM’ponisi;

Tese ngaticheme pamwe;

Jesu, Tenzi, waroverwa.



2. Hatimuchemeri here?

Ari kusekwa navanhu;

Onai kutiwa kwake;

Jesu, Tenzi, waroverwa.



3. Wabaiwa manja, tsoka,

Wapera ngenyota zvino,

Ropa razadza maziso;

Jesu, Tenzi, waroverwa.



4. Wareva mazwi manomwe

Panguva yese yedima,

Achinamatira vanhu;

Jesu, Tenzi, waroverwa.



5. Ngatimire tese pamwe

Pasi poM’chinjiko wake,

Ropa ngaritidonhere;

Jesu Tenzi waroverwa.



6. Kumbirai muchapiwa

Mwoyo mutsva unosuva;

Tenzi Jesu ngaticheme;

Watifira paM’chinjiko.

hymnTitle: All ye who seek for sure relief
hymnContent:
1. IMI munoda kurapwa

Munyatwa nenhamo,

Mukutambudzwa kwepfungwa,

Nemhosva yemwoyo.


2. Jesu wakafira ini

Pa’Mchinjiko wake

Ari kumuzururira

Mwoyo wake zvino


3. Makanzwa’zvo akareva

Mazwi anomutsa;

Uyai mese maneta,

Ndimupe zororo.

4. Jesu ugere kudenga

Tinokuda pano

Taunzwa nemazwi ako,

Tinokunamata.


5. Utisukise ngeropa

Rakabva munewe,

Upe vese mwoyo mitsva

Vanokuchemera.

hymnTitle: O sacred head surrounded
hymnContent:
1 MUSORO Unoyera

Washorwa nokufirwa

Musoro wabaiwa

Ngeminzwa inopinza.

Ngei unofa Tenzi

Ngei uchinzwa nhamo?

Iwe wakudzwa zvino

Ngehondo dzengerosi.


2 Runako rwomuviri

Haruwonekwi zvino

Rapera samba rako,

Ruveneko rwadzima.

Uri kufira ini

Usa dzisvise tsitsi;

Ndionise Mponisi

Usu hworudo rwako.


3 Ndinoda kwazvo Tenzi

Kuona nhamo newe

Ndinoda kukufira.

Pamuchinjiko wako.

Ndiite ndizomire

Petyo poMuchinjiko;

Ndigare ndichichema

Mudiwa wandifira.


4 Undibatsire Jesu

Pamisi yangu yese.

Uite kufa kwangu

Kusandityise ini

Ndionise mukufa.

Maoko abaiwa,

Atambanudze apo

Atore mweya wangu.

hymnTitle: Forgive them, O my Father
hymnContent:
1. JESU wakataura

Achiroverwa mbambo;

Baba vasunungure

Ngekuti havazivi.


2. Jesu haasakatuka

Kana akaroverwa,

Wakavanamatira

Achida Baba wake.

3. Kuneni mutsa wake,

Kuneni rudo rwake,

Neniwo ndaenzana

Navakamurovera.



4. Zvitadzo zvangu zvese

Nembambo dzakaipa,

Zvakarovera Tenzi

Zvakanga zviri zvangu.




5. Kazhinji ndarishora

Izwiro rine mutsa,

Ndisunungure, Jesu,

Ndatadza kwazvo ini.




6. Nomutsa wako, Jesu,

Norudo rwako, Tenzi,

Dzorera vakarasika

Ngekuti havazivi.

hymnTitle: At the Cross he station dkeeping
hymnContent:
1 Mai anosuruvara,

Anomira achichema,

Petyo poMchinjiko

Mwoyo wake wakatombwa

Nepfumo rinipinzisa

Rorusuvo norudo




2. Mai wakasuva sei!

Panguva yedambudziko

RoMukorore wake.

Mai wakatendeseka

Wakamuchemera sei!

Muponisi wepasi.




3. Ndiani asingagoni

Kuchema, kuona mai

Achijakwacha apo?

Ndiani, achitondera,

Kusuva kwamai wacho

Asingakukoveri?




4. Wakaona Tenzi Jesu

Kukorera Muchinjiko,

Pamusana pezvitadzo.

Wakamirira, dakara

Akakotama musoro

Nokuregera mweya




5 Mai worudo nenyasha

Ngandinzwe kusuwakwako

Kuti ndicheme newe.

Rudo rwaKristu runotsva

Mumwoyo wangu narini,

Kuti ndimufarire.



6 Ndipe kuti nditakure

Mavanga aTenzi Jesu,

Mumuviri wanguwo;

Ndipe kuti ndimwe ropa

Rakaparadzirwa isu,

PaMuchinjiko wake.




7 Panguva yokufa kwangu

Ngeminamato yaMai

Ndidzivirire, Tenzi

Ndipe kuti mweya wangu,

Ugarewo mukupenya

Kwepasi rinouya

hymnTitle: Jesus Christ is risen today
hymnContent:
1. FARAI Jesu wamuka, Areruya!

Musi kuno wokufara, Areruya!

Wakafa paM’chinjiko, Areruta!

Kutisunungura isu. Areruya!


2. Kuna Kristu tinoimba

Ndwiyo dzokuvirikidza,

Wakaisa muguva,

Kuponisa vanyangadzi,


3. Asi nhamo’yo akanzwa

Yakaunza ruponiso,

Zvino ugere Mambo

Achikudzwa ngengerosi,

hymnTitle: The strife is o’er, the battle done
hymnContent:
1. ARERUYA! ARERUYA! ARERUYA!

Kurwa nenhamo zvaguma,

Zvino Jesu wakurira

Ngatiimbe ngerutendo

Areruya!


2. Kufa kwakarwa ngesimba,

Asi Jesu wakurira;

Tifare tichidaidza;

.

3. Wamuka zvino muguva

Kutonga mumbiri huru;

Isu tiimbe tifare.


4. Inzwai! Denga rafara,

Pasi raimba zviimbo,

Asi Gehena rachema



5. Tenzi ponisa mukufa,

Ngesimba renhamo yako,

Tipone tikutunhidze.

hymnTitle: Light glittering morn bedecks the sky
hymnContent:
1 KUPENYA kwabuda zvino,

Inzwa kufara kwedenga,

Pasi rafadzwa raimba,

Gehena riri kuchema.


2 Mambo mukuru wevese

Wabvisa nhamo yokufa;

Wakunda samba redima,

Waponisa vanhu vake.



3 Guva rake rakarindwa

Ndivo varindi nezihwe;

Asi zvino anembiri

Wauya somukuriri.



4 Wasunungurwa mukufa,

Nguva yenhamo yapera,

Ngerosi yasima kuti

Tenzi wenyu wamukazve.



5 Tenzi Jesu,gara nesu

Zvino mukufara kwedu,

Utichengete narini

Musimba rese rekufa.


6 Mbiri ngaive kunewe

Wakamukazve mukufa,

Mbiri kuna mwari baba,

Kuno Mweya Unoyera. Amen.

hymnTitle: O sons and daughters, let us sing
hymnContent:
1 ARERUYA! ARERUYA! ARERUYA!

Vanhu vese ngavaimbe

Mambo wedenga nembiri

Wakurira kufa nhasi.

Areruya!



2. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Uyo musi mangwanani

Zvo vakadzi vakaenda

Kundoona guva rake.



3. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Vakaiona ngerosi,

Ikati kuna vatatu

“Jesu waenda Garire.”



4. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Tenzi wavo wakauya

Kuna vadzidzi achiti,

“Ndinomupa runyararo.”



5. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Izvo Tomasi akanzwa

Kuti Tenzi waoneka

Wakaramba kudavira



6. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Tomasi ona rutivi,

Namaoko namakumbo,

Davira usapokane.”



7. Areruya! Areruya!A Reruya!

Wakarega kupokana

Zvo akaona maronda,

Akati “Tenzi naMwari.”



8. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Vakakomborerwa avo

Vanodavira ngemwoyo

Vachagashira upenyu.



9. Areruya! Areruya! Areruya!

Pamusi uno mukuru

Simudzai mwoyo yenyu,

Farai, mutende Mwari.

hymnTitle: Jesus lives! Thy terrors now
hymnContent:
1. JESU ari mupenyu

Ndizvo kufa hatikutyi

Ngeizvi tinoziva

Hatisungwi zvino ndiko.

Areruya!



2. Jesu ari mupenyu

Kare rufu rwaityisa

Asi tichanyaradzwa

Pazambara roupenyu.



3. Jesu ari mupenyu

Wakafira isu tose;

Takachenurwa ndiye,

Tese ngatimutunhidze.




4. Jesu ari mupenyu

Anodisa vanhu vake

Muupenyu norufu

Ari petyo panaivo



5. Jesu ari mupenyu

Anotonga zviro zvese;

Tingasvike kudenga

Kumuona nokufara.

hymnTitle: Thy Lamb’s high banquet we await
hymnContent:
1. TADAIDZWA kusangana

Pano paChidyo cheNyenye;

Takabira nyanza Tsvuku

Tiimbire Jesu Mambo.


2. PaOtari yoM’chinjiko

Wakatiripira mhosva;

Ropa rake ngatirimwe,

Tigare naye ndiMwari.


3. Vanhu vakasunungurwa

Muhasha dzaMambo Faro;

Vachiponiswa usiku

Pakapfuura ngerosi.


4. M’ponisi wakabaiwa,

. SeNyenye isina vara;

Nyama yake, chingwa chedi,

Inondopiwa kunesu.



5. Muteuro unokwana,

Wakakurira Gehrna;

Vasungwi vasunungurwa,

Vapiwa upenyu ndiye.


6. Tiri kukudza rumuko;

Rwakauyazve nesimba,

Rukasunga mhandu yedu,

Nokutiwanira musha.


7. Mbiri ngaive kunewe.

Wakamukazve mukufa,

Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,

Nokuna Mweya Mutsvene. Amen.

hymnTitle: Christ the Lord is risen to-day
hymnContent:
1. NGEKUMUKA kwake

Kristu wakakurira,

Pasi raponiswa

Ndiye Mambo wedu;

Hondo dzengerosi

Dziri kufarira,

Dzamuvirikidza,

Dzaimba Areruya.


2. Uyo wakazvipa

Kare paM’chinjiko,

Ndiye Paska yedu

Nyenye yakachena;

Wakafira isu,

Zvino ane mbiri,

Tese tinofara,

Tiimbe Areruya.


3. Uyo wakafira

Isu vanhu vake,

Zvino muponisi

Anesimba rese;

Mambo wavamambo

Anotonga vese,

Ngatimutunhidze

Tiimbe Areruya.


4. Wakatidzorera

Varasiki vese,

Vangasunungurwe

Vanyangadzi ndiye;

Paska yedu iwe

Tichenurwe tese,

Tikukudze Kristu;

Tiimbe Areruya.

hymnTitle: At the Lamb’s high feast we sing
hymnContent:
1. TINOVIRIKIDZA

Mambo wakurira,

Wakarasa ropa

Saka takachena;

Kristu muteuro

Kristu mupiristi

Muri chidyo chedu,

Tasvusvudzwa ndiye.


2. Kudya kwedu, kwedi

Muviri waKritu;

Pano tinorimwa

Ropa rinoyera;

Ngativirikidze

Kristu Paska ydu,

Mana yokudenga

Chingwa choupenyu.


3. Kare vaipona

Vanhu na’ro ropa,

Vakabira nyanza

Mhandu dzakanyudzwa;

Nhasi taimbira

Jesu Muponisi;

Ndiye Nyenyedzi yedu

Yakafira isu.


4. Tenzi Muteuro

Wakakunda kufa

Wakatinunura,

Wakavura Denga;

Mbiri kunaKristu,

Ndiye Muponisi

Tinomutunhidza

NaBaba noMweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: Come ye faithful, raise the strain
hymnContent:
1. Imi vadaviri

Farirai mese,

Mwari waponisa

Israeri wake

Vanhu vakasungwa

Kare ndiye Faro,

Vakabira Nyanza

Vakasunungurwa


2. Imbirai Kristu,

Waparura guva,

Achibuda nhasi

Zuva rine mbiri;

Dima rechitadzo

Ndiye waridzinga

Ruvheneko rwedi

Rwativhenekera.


3. Musi wokumuka,

Musi wokupenya;

Tafariswa ndiwe,

Wapedzisa nhamo.

Kuna Mambo wedu,

Wakurira kufa,

Zvino Ngatiimbe

Tese Areruya.

Nhungamiri. JESU nhasi wakamuka mukufa;

Vanhu. Vese vanhu pasi vaona kuti ndiye Mwana

WaMwari mukuru.

Trebles. Ngerosi kuguva dzataura kuti, Wamuka,

Vanhu. Amen, A-re-ruya, Amen.

Vadzdzi vake vaka – shamiswa

Vese vanhu pasi vaona kuti ndiye Mwana waMwari

mukuru.

Kwakaenda mbiri muJudea rese –

Wakakunda simba rake Satani –

Ngatinyinde ndiJesu Mwana waMwari –

Ngatimuke naye mukumuka kwake –

1. N, TENZI wedu Jesu Kristu wakamuka

V. Tenzi wedu Jesu Kristu, Tenzi wedu Jesu Kristu Wakamuka.

2. N. Wakakunda zvitadzo, Areruya;

V Wakakunda zvitadzo, Areruya!

3. N. Areruya, nhasi uno,tinofara;

V. Areruya nhasi uno, tinofara.

4 N. Anopona zvino pano, Areruya;

V. Areruya, nhasi uno, tinofara.

5. N. Tipfugame, tipfugame tinamate;

V. Tipfugame, nomwoyo, tinamate.

6. N. Inzwai, inzwai, denga rafara;

V. Ngerosi dzaimba, Ngerosi dzaimba Areruya.

hymnTitle: On the resurrection morning
hymnContent:
1. MUSI uyo wokumuka

Mweya unouyazve;

Nhamo kufa nokuchema,

Zvapera.

2. Asi mweya wabva pano

Muviri wozorora,

Uchirara mumakuva

Muhope.


3. Muvirizve wakaneta

Unorara muguva,

Kumirira musi uyo

Koedza


4. Asi mweya chisimbirira

Kunamata Mwari,

Uchivirikidza Mwari

Norwiyo.


5. Mweya zvese nomuviri,

Hazvizopatsaniswi,

Kuyenzana naye Kristu

Zvagutswa.


6. Rufaro rwomusi uyo

Wokumuka mukufa,

Haruzoperi narini

Narini.


7. Baba, mai, hama, vana,

Pamusi worumuko,

Vachazokumbanazve norufaro.


8. Pakuguma tichasvika

Kuupenyu hwembiri,

Nokugara newe uko

Kudenga.

1. PAMUSI weIsita, Areruya

Jesu wamuka, Areruya.

2. Wakabviswa muguva mangwanani

Wakaonekwawo naMaria

3. Akafamba nhasi kuEmaus

Akavazivisa mumba mavo.


4. Vapostori zvino vakasara

Madekwana nhasi vachidya.


5. Nemisuwo apo yakapfigwa

Jesu anouya kuvadzidzi.


6. Runyararo rwake anovapa

Vanofarisazve kumuona


7. Tomasi mutsvene asipo

Apo akazvinzwa naVadzidzi.



8. Akaramba kwazvo kuzvitenda

“Ndikaona Jesu ndinotenda



9. Ngandiise munwe mumaronda;

Ngandiise ruoko murutivi.”


10. Mazuva masere apfuura

Jesu akadzoka kuvadzidzi.



11. Ipapo akati kuna Tomasi

“Uya uonezve zvanza zvangu.


12. Tomasi akatenda “Ishe wangu.”

Akanamatazve “Mwari wangu.”


13. Vakakomborerwa vanomuona

Vakakomborerwa vanotenda.


14. Jesu wakamuka, Areruya:

PaMusi weIsita Areruya.

1. ARERUYA, haangakurirwi ngekufa (katatu)


2. Areruya haangagari muguva.

3. Areruya, wakamuka mukufa

4. Areruya, wakamuka noupenyu ngedi.


5. Areruya, ngatimuke naye


6. Areruya, ngatimufarire tese


7. Areruya, ngatitende Mwari

hymnTitle: The day of Resurrection
hymnContent:
1. NHASI wamuka mukufa,

Ngerosi dzinofara,

Jesu watomuka chose,

Nesimba rake rose.


2. Wakunda vavengi vese

Rufu, chitadzo, nyika

Navaipi vachipenga:

Tikudze Tenzi wedu.


3. Ngerosi zvino yasvika,

Yazarura guva’ro,

Jesu Tenzi wararama:

Tikudze Mambo wedu.


4. Farai zvino Vatsvene

Kudenga, navo pasi,

Jesu wapedza kurwako:

Tikudze Tenzi wedu.


5. Wakamuka achifara:

Kufa kwakakundwa ndiye.

Kuti tafa muchitadzo,

Timuke pamwe naye

hymnTitle: Ye choirs of new Jerusalem
hymnContent:
1. VANHU veJerusarema

Farai nesu,

Tinokotsa bira nhasi

RaKristu mukundi.


2. Jesu uya wakadimbura

Majoti orufu,

Wakapwanya musoro we

Shato yakaipa.


3. NdiJesu anodaidza

Kumutsa vakafa

Mudima reHadesi

Nokuvanunura


4. Jesu wakapindiridza

Mumukundo wake

Simba rese rinopiwa

Kunaiye kudenga.


5. Mbiri yese inopiwa

KunaMambo wedu,

Tapota tipinde umo

Nokugara naye.


6. Mbiri kunoMukorore

Taa kupereka:

Timuvirikidze Baba

NoMweya mumwezve

Areruya! Amen.

hymnTitle: O Lord most high, eternal King
hymnContent:
1. MAMBO naTenzi mugari

Tinokutenda M’ponisi

Wakaparadza Satani

Norudo nenyasha dzako.


2. Uri kukwira kudenga

Kutora umambo hwako;

Zvee pano hauchagari

Mudambudziko repasi.


3. Zvese zviro zvasikwa

Zvinokotama kwauri;;

Zviro zvepasi nedenga,

Ne’zvo zvisingaoneki.


4. Dziri kushama ngerosi

Kutarisa nyama yedu,

Yayeriswa nokukudzwa

Nokutora kwako unhu.


5. Iwe Rufaro rwedu Tenzi,

Iwe muchengeti wedu,

Ngatikudze iwe Tenzi

Zvino napanguva dzese.


6. Mwoyo yese ngaitende

KunaTenzi wakakwira;

Mbiri yese kunaBaba,

NoMweya Unoyera. Amen.

hymnTitle: Hail the day that sees him rise
hymnContent:
1. NHASI tatenda Jesu, Areruya!

Achikwira kudenga; Areruya!

Wakafira zvitadzo, Areruya!

Wakaenda kudenga, Areruya!


2. Mbiri yamurindira,

Misuo zurukai!

Wakakunda Satani,

Mambo wembiri, pinda!


3. Zvino ari kupinda,

Rese denga rafara,

Iye wasiya pasi

Asi anoridisa.


4. Wasimudza maoko;

Ona maronda ake,

Zvioniso zvorudo!

Wakomborera vanhu.


5. Anotikumbirira,

Wakatifira isu,

Anopinda Kudenga

Achigarira isu.


6. Tenzi wakakwirazve,

Wakaenda kudenga,

Ngatikwire nomwoyo

Ngatikwire nomwoyo

hymnTitle: See the Conqueror mounts in triumph
hymnContent:
1. JESU Mukuriri wedu

Samambo anogadzwa;

Anokwira pamakore

Kuzambara redenga;

Hondo dzengerosi dzese

Dzinoti Areruya.

Zarudzai mazambara,

Kuti Mambo apinde!


2. Ndianiko anouya

Nokurira kwehwama?

Tenzi naMwari wehondo,

Uyo wakakurira,

Uyo wakatambudzika,

Kamwe paMuchinjiko,

Asi ngerumuko rwako,

Wakakurira Satan.


3. Wakwidza unhu hwedu

Kuna Mwari kum’soro;

Akatigarisa denga

Pamwe chete naKristu

Tese tinotonga umo,

Mwari pamwe nomunhu;

Tenzi mukukwira kwako,

Tinoonawo kwedu.


4. Mutungamiriri wedu,

Wakatanga apinda

Kutigadzirira nzvimbo

Muumambo hwedenga:

Anorarama narini

Achitinamatira;

Uyo achazouyazve

Pmusi wokutongwa.


5. Mbiri kunaMwari Baba;

NokunoMukorore,

Uyo wakawana denga

Ngekutifira tese.

Mbiri ngaive kuMweya,

Mbiri kunoUtatu;

Mbiri pasi nokudenga,

Mbiri isingagumi. Amen.

hymnTitle: When God of old came down from Heaven
hymnContent:
1. KARE Mwari wakadzika

PaSinai nesimba;

Makore akatsemuka

Nomwoto neutsi.


2. PaPendekost wakauya

Nesimba norudo;

Njiva yake yakadzika

Nokuzvirereka.


3. Mwoto pamusoro peSinai

Wakatyisa kwazvo

Zvino unojeka kwazvo

Pavatsvene vese.


4. VaIsraeri vakanzwa

Izwi rine ruzha,

Rainge tsuri yaMwari

Yakabva kudenga.


5. Panguvayo izvo Mweya

Wakauya pasi,

Ruzha rukuru rwemhepo

Rwakabva kudenga,


6. Chechi yakazadzwa zvino

Nepasi resezve,

Vane mwoyo mikukutu

Havachanzwi Mweya.


7. Tenzi, Nzero, Rudo, Simba,

Nzeve dzedu dzinzwe

Tisapunyutse nguva’no,

Tiponise Tenzi.

hymnTitle: Come, Holy Ghost, Creator blest
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA Musiki tifemere,

Utungamirire mwoyo yedu

Wakatisika Mwari wedu,

Utipe simba rokudenga.


2. Unonzi iwe Munyaradzi,

Nechipo chokumsorosoro;

Upenyu hwomuwoyo wedu,

Mafuta okuzora mweya.


3. Zvipo zvinomwe zvokudenga

Utipe zvino Mweya Unoyera;

Uri chitsidzo chine simba

ChaBaba anesimba rese.


4. Uvenekere isu tese,

Utizadze une rudo;

Miviri yedu yakaziya

Upe simba renarini.


5. Udzinge zvino mhandu yedu,

Utipe runyararo rwako:

Hatichakundwi ndiSatani

Nokuti unotibatsira.


6. Munewe ngatizive Baba,

Ngatizivewo Mukorore;

Ngatikuzive Mweya wedi

WaBaba neweMukorore.


7. Ngatiremedze Mwari Baba

NoMukorore pamwe chete;

NoMweya ngatiremekedze

Nyamusi namazuva ese. Amen.

hymnTitle: Come, Holy Ghost, our souls inspire
hymnContent:
1. UYA ufemere mweya yedu,

A! Mweya Unoyera waMwari!

Ivenekere, mwoto wedenga,

Izvo uri’we unotizora.

Uya ufemere mweya yedu,

A! Mweya Unoyera waMwari!


2. Unotiunzira chipo chimwe,

Chako iwewe mbune pachako,

Icho kana chiri chimwe hacho,

Chinotisandirawo kanomwe.


3. Kuuya kwako kubva kudenga,

Kunotikomborera ngesimba

Rorunyaradzo neroupenyu,

Norujeko rwakozve runopfuta.


4. Murujeko rwako tichagona

Kunatsa kuona zvese zvese;

Muupfumi hwegrasia rako,

Tinosukwa nokurerukirwa.


5. Tizere tsvina nokugumirwa

Mukusuka kwako namazano,

Tinocheneswawo nokungwadzwa,

Tichizogara murunyararo.


6. Kuti ukatingamirira,

Chakaipa hachitikuadzi,

Tichakotsekana tese tese

Kubva kwese kune mhandu dzedu.


7. Tidzidzise kuti tizive,

Kuti kuuya kwako munesu;

Kuuya kwaJesu munesu,

Naye Baba une samba rese.


8. Ita tirambe tichitunhidza

Isuwo umambo hwako Mwari,

Nokugara ngeuhwo upenyu

Hunoyera nohusingagumi.

hymnTitle: Spirit of mercy, truth, and love.
hymnContent:
97

Spirit of mercy, truth, and love.

8888

1. IWE Mweya Unoyera

Nyasha, chokwadi, norudo,

Paradzirao panesu

Nezvikomborero nhasi.



2. Nyika dzese ngadziimbe

Mbiri yaMwari vaimbe,

Vazive mabasa ese

Muponisi akaita.


3. Munyaradzi wokudenga

Gara munesu muChechi;

Zvipo zvako ngatipiwe

Iwe Mweya Unoyera.

hymnTitle: Come, thou Holy Spirit, come
hymnContent:
1. UYA, Mweya Mutsvene,

Dira zvino panesu

Ruveneko rwedenga;

Baba wevanoshaya,

Mupi wezvipo zvese,

Mwenje womwoyo, uya.


2. Ndiwezve Musimbisi,

Mukokwa, Mufarisi;

Munyaradzi wepasi;

Mumvuri mukudziya,

Mubasa, kuzorora

Munhamo kufarawo.


3. Kupenya kunochena,

Pinda mumwoyo yedu,

Zadza ngerudo rwako.

Ega munhu inhando,

Zviro zvese zvachena

Zvinobva ndiwe Mwari.


4. Sukawo vane tsvina,

Urape vanorwadzwa,

Diridza vakaoma,

Utyore vakukutu,

Dziisa vatonhorwa,

Udzore varasika.


5. Kune vanodavira

Navo vanosimbira

Vapewo zvipo zvako;

Uvape grasia zvino

Kuguma ruponiso

Nokufara kudenga.

hymnTitle: Above the starry spheres
hymnContent:
1. KUMUSORO kudenga

Kumusha waBaba

Kristu wakakwira uko

Kundotuma chipo.


2. Zuva rakatsidzwa

Ndiye Tenzi Jesu,

Rakange rasvika iro

Zuva rePendekoste.


3. Vadzidzi vakange

Varikunamata,

Vakaziviswa nemhepo

Kuvapo kwaMwari.


4. Runambi rwomoto

Rwakabva kudenga;

Mwoyo yese yakapiwa

Rujeko rwaBaba.


5. Vese vakapiwa

Mweya Unoyera,

Vakataura nendimi

Mabasa aTenzi.


6. Vatorwa varipo

Kubva nyika dzese,

Vakashamiswa kuinzwa

Mitauro yavo


7. Vanhu vaivapo

Vakavatsvinyira;

Vachiti ava varume

Vararadza vese


8. Petro wakamira

Akatseura’wo

Kusadavira kwavanhu,

Akavapindutsa


9. Tinokudza Baba

Mwana noMweya zve,

Nhambwe dzese ngatipiwe

Zvipo zvake Mweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: Gracious Spirit, Holy Ghost
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA une grasia,

Mupi wezvipo zvese,

Tinochiva zvikuru

Chipo chorudo.


2. Rudo harunyangadzi;

Rune mutsa nenyasha,

Runokurira kufa,

Tipewo rudo.


3. Rudo norudaviro,

Nechivimbo, taona

Izvi zvitatu zvese.

Chikuru rudo.


4. Unogara kumusoro

Nepfuma dzese dzedi,

Tipe tinokumbira

Chipo chorudo.

hymnTitle: All hail, adored Trinity
hymnContent:
1. TINOOMBERA UTATU,

Tinoombera Uhumwe,

Mwari Baba, Mukorore

NoMweya Unoyera.


2. Iri zuva rokufara

Vese vanokunamata;

Ona iri zuva nhasi

Nziyo dzokutenda kwedu.

Amen.



3. Ngatiimbire Vatatu

Asi Mwari mumwe chete

Mwari ita tirurame

Nesimba rako norudo.



4. Utatu munoUhumwe

Iva nesu tonamata,

Tichiimba nengerosi

Pamwepo tichikukudza.

hymnTitle: Bright the vision that delighted
hymnContent:
1. KARE kwazvo Muprofiti

Akaona kudenga

Zhinji hondo dzengerosi

Dzichiimbira Mwari.


2. Dzakapfugama ngerosi

Dzichiimbira Mwari,

Dzakazara umba yake

Dzichiimba dzichiti:


3. “Mbiri yako inozadza

Denga nepasi rese,

Iwe Unoyera Tenzi

Tinokupa mbirizve”


4. Mbiri inorira denga

Pasi richiimbazve,

Iwe Unoyera Tenzi,

Iwe Mwari Mukuru.

5. Isu pamwe ngatiimbe

Nengerosi Kudenga

Nei Chechi pasi pano

Mazwi okutunhidza.

6 “Mbiri yako inozadza

Denga nepasi rese,

Iwe Unoyera Tenzi

Tinokupa mbirizve”

hymnTitle: Be near us, Holy Trinity
hymnContent:
1. IVA panesu Utatu,

Mwari mumwe unojeka,

Kunewe zvese zvinobva,

Uri mavambo ezvese.

2. Nouwandu hwenyenyedzi

Kunewe hunotunhidza;

Pasi nenyanza nedenga

Zvinokuimbira rwiyo.


3. Nesu vanamati vako,

Kunewe tinopfugama;

Tinokudza nokufara

Navatsvene nengerosi.


4. Tinodavira Uhumwe;

Tinonamata Utatu;

Pamwe nezvisikwa zvese,

Tese tinokutunhidza.


5. Mbiri kunaMwari Baba,

Mbiri kunoMukorore,

Mbiri kunewezve Mweya,

Utatu hwakavandika. Amen.

hymnTitle: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty
hymnContent:
1. IWE Unoyera, Mwari unesimba,

Mangwanani tinoimbira kunewe;

Iwe Unoyera, nomutsa nesimba,

Mwari mumweyo muno Utatu.


2. Iwe Unoyera, Vatsvene kudenga

Vanokuombera nezviremba zvavo;

Chita chengerosi chinokutunhidza

Mwari usingagumi narini.


3. Iwe Unoyera, rima rinosvisa

Mbiri yako huru kune vanyangadzi

Iwe Unoyera, hapanazve mumwe

Anoperera simba, norudo.



4.Iwe Unoyera, Mwari Unesimba

Pasi, denga, nyanza zvinokutunhidza;

Iwe Unoyera, nomutsa nesimba

Mwari mumweyo munoUtatu.

hymnTitle: Three in One and One in Three
hymnContent:
1. MWARI mumwe Utatu,

Mambo wepasi pese,

Inzwa kuchema kwedu

Tinokumbira.


3. Kupenya kwemauro

Zvitadzo zviregererwe,

Tibatsire nomutsa,

Norunyararo.



2. Kupenya kwoKupenya,

Tejekeserwe newe,

Rudo rwako rukuru ,

Rutifemere.

4. Mwari mumwe Utatu

Tinokukudza pano

Utipe zvipo zvako

Navanoyera .

hymnTitle: Oh God, our help in ages past
hymnContent:
1. MUBATSIRI wedu Mwari,

Tariro yeduzve,

Mudziviriri Munhamo

Chivimbo narini.


2. Pasi peChigaro chako

Vatsvene vakotswa,

Ruoko rwako rwokwana

Kutidzivirira.


3. Zvese zvisati zvavapo

Makomo nepasi,

Iwe wakanga uripo

Mugari narini.


4. Misi mizhinji kunewe

Inenge kanguva,

Senguva yorungwanani

Kusati kwayedza.


5. Nguva inokunguruka,

Musi nomusizve;

Zvichakanganika zvese

Sokurota hope.


6. Mubatsiri wedu, Mwari,

Tariro yeduzve,

Mudziviriri munhamo

Chivimbo narini.4

hymnTitle: Now thank we all our God
hymnContent:
1. NGATITENDE Mwari

Nesimba redu rese,

Wakatiponisa,

Wakachengeta isu;

Wakakomborera

Isu nhambwe dzese

Nezvipo zvizhinji,

Ari wedu zvino.

2. NdiMwari agree

Petyo nesu narini,

Tifadze mumwoyo

Norunyararo rwake;

Tikotse nenyasha,

Nokutitungamidza,

Utiregerere

Mukuipa Kwese


3. Ngativirikidze

Mwari Baba Mukuru,

Mwana noMweya

Unotonga kudenga,

Mwari mumwe chete,

Uyo zvese zviro

Zvinovirikidza

Napanguva dzese.

Amen.

hymnTitle: Onward, Christian soldiers
hymnContent:
1 FAMBAI Makristu

Mukurwa kwedu,

M’chinjiko waJesu

Uri pamberi

Tinotungamidzwa

NaKristu Mambo,

Onai pamberi

Mureza wake.

Fambai, Makristu

Mukurwa kwedu,

M’chinjiko waJesu

Uri pamberi


2. Kristu akakunda

Hondo yaSatan,

Makristu hendei

Kundokurira.

Rima rinotyisa

Nenziyo dzedu;

Hama ngatiimbe

Zvitendo zvedu.



3. SeChechi yaMwari

Iri kurwisa,

Hama tinofamba

Sezvo vatsvene;

Hatipatsaniswi

Tese pamwepo,

Tiri muchivimbo

Norudo rumwe.

4. Umambo hwepasi

Huchaperazve;

Igere narini

Chechi yaKristu

Zvese zvipingidzo

Haziikundi

Chitsidzo ChaKristu

Hachingakonwi


5. Fambai Pamberi

Makristu ese,

Musongane nesu

Nenziyo dzedu

Ngatikudze Kristu

Mambo wembiri

Isu neNgerosi

Tichisiimba

hymnTitle: My God, how wonderful thou art
hymnContent:
1. MWARI uri munanisi

Umambo hwakozve;

Nomutsa wako mukuru

Unojeka kwazvo.


2. Iwe unoremekedzwa

Tenzi ndiwe Mwari,

Unoomberwa zvikuru,

Uchivirikidzwa.


3. Ndinokutya Mwari wangu

Nokutya kukuru,

Nokukuombera Tenzi

Nechemo yorudo.


4. Asi Tenzi ndinokuda,

Unesimba rese

Nokuti wakakumbira

Kuti ndikudise.


5. Hapana baba namai

Vonondida sewe,

Unondinyengera kwazvo

Ini munyangadzi.


6. Mwari ndiBaba waJesu

Ndichafara kwazvo

Kukotama mberi kwako

Ndikuyeve zvangu.

hymnTitle: Pleasant are thy courts above
hymnContent:
1. DZIMBA dzako Kudenga

Dzinofadzisa kwazvo;

Dzati dzepano pasi

Dzinonakisa pano;

Mweya wangu wodisa

Kugara navatsvene,

Ndiyeve usu hwako

Ndgere newe Mwari.


2. Shiri dziri kuimba,

Kudenga dzinofara;

Vanhu vanozorodzwa

Vanewe pasi pano;

Kana vari munjodzi

Nedambudzo repasi,

Asi muumba yako

Vanonyaradzwa umo.



3. Vari kufamba pano

SavaIsraeriwo

Murwendo vari kumwa

Manazve vari kudya:

Manazve vari kudya:

Vari kusimbisiswa

Kuti vasvike umo,

Vachikukudza apo,

Wakavatungamidza.



4. Tenzi nditungamidze

Murwendo rwangu pano;

Ndichengete nomutsa,

Kwauri ndidaidze.

Uri Zuva neNhoo

Chengeta mwoyo wangu;

Une nyasha nembiri

Une nyasha nembiri

Zvipe kwandiri Tenzi.

hymnTitle: Loving Shepherd of thy sheep
hymnContent:
1. MUFUDZI unondida

Chengeta nyenye yako;

Simba rako iguru

Handibviswi kunewe.


2. M’ponisi une rudo

Wakandifira ini;

Simudza manja ako

Uonise mavanga


3. Ndinoda kukukudza

Ndiite rudo rwako,

Savatsvene kudenga

Vari kukuombera

4. Mufudzi wakanaka

Dzidzisa nyenye yako,

Ndirege kurasika

Munzira yakanaka.


5 Ndinoda kutevera

Tsoka dzako, M’ponisi,

Dzamara ndichisvika

Kukuona kudenga.

hymnTitle: Praise the Lord, ye heaven adore him
hymnContent:
1. DENGA virikidza Mwari

Ngerosi tunhidzai;

Zuva mwedzi kotamai

Nyenyedzi mukudzei,

M’ponisi wakataura

Pasi rakanzwa izwi,

Mwari wakapa mitemo

Isingazotyorwizve.


2. Mukudzei Chine Mbiri

Haatyori chitsidzo,

Vatsvene vakund ndive;

Akavapa mukundo.

Mukudzei Muponisi

Ngerosi imbaiwo,

Denga pasi rezvisikwa

Kudzai Zita rake.

hymnTitle: Praise, my soul, the King of Heaven
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA ‘ngu rumbidza Mambo

Uunze chipo chako,

Wakasunungurwa ndiye

Muimbire narini;

Areruya, Areruya!

Ngaarumbidzwe Mambo.


2. Timurumbidzire nyasha

Kuna vababa vedu;

Anogara akadaro,

Ha’chimbidzi kushora.

Areruya, Areruya!

Iye mutendeseki.


3. Unotichengeta kwazvo

SaBaba Unotida

Unotibata nomutsa

Unodzinga mhanduzve

Areruya, Areruya!

Mutsa wako mukuru


4. Mutunhidzei ngerosi,

Muri kumutarisa;

Pfugamai, Vanoyera,

Vendudzi dzese dzese;

Areruya, Areruya!

Tese titende Mwari.

hymnTitle: Father of Heaven, whose love profound
hymnContent:
1. BABA wedu wokudenga

Wakaponisa norudo,

Vatadzi tinochemawo,

Tisunungure norudo.


2. Mukorore unesimba

Mupristi, M’ponisi, Tenzi,

Vatadzi tinochemawo,

Tiponisewo nenyasha.

3. Nokufemera kwoMweya

Vatadzi vanomutsiwa,

Mukufa nomuzvitadzo,

Tipe simba rako guru.

4. Baba, Mukorore, Mweya,

Utatu hwakavandika

Vatadzi tinochemawo,

Tipe nyasha noupenyu.


Amen.

hymnTitle: Jesus, the very thought is sweet
hymnContent:
1. JESU Zita rakanaka!

Kurinzwa kunotifadza

Asi kuona Iyewo

Kunotifadza zvikuru.


2. Hakuchina Izwi rimwe

Ringatifadze seiri.

Kuti tafunga Zita’ro

Tinosimbiswa tikunde.


3. Jesu! Chivimbo chavanhu,

Mufudzi wavapinduki;

Unenyasha kunevese

Vanonyanya kukutsvaka.

4. Mazwi haangatiudzi

Rudo rukuru rwaJesu,

Asi vanodiwa vake

Vanoziva urwo rudo.

5. Jesu Mambo anesimba,

Mukuriri wakakunda;

Iwe wakanaka chose

Wakanatsokutifadza.

6. Tenzi nhasi gara nesu

Tizadze nenyasha dzako.

Mweya yedu ngaigutswe

Nokunaka kwako kwese.

hymnTitle: Jesu, grantg me this, I pray
hymnContent:
1. NDIPE kuti ndigare

Mumwoyo wako Jesu;

Ngandigare narini

Murutivi rwaJesu.


2. Kuti Satan’ nepasi,

Achiisa chiteyo

Handibatwi, ndigere

Mumwoyo wako Jesu.

3. Kuti ndichirunzirwa

Ngeruchiva rwenyama

Handizotyi ndigere

Mumwoyo wako Jesu.

4. Ndichafa rimwe zuva,

Usandirase Jesu;

Ngandigare murufu

Mumwoyo wako Jesu.

hymnTitle: Rock of ages cleft for me
hymnContent:
1, DOMBO rakatsemurwa

Ngandivande munewe;

Nemvura neropazve

Zvakabva murutivi,

Ngazvibvse chitadzo

Nokundichenesesa.


2. Handikwanisi ndega

Kuchengeta mitemo;

Kana ndichichemera

Zvitadzo nguva dzese

Handibviswi mumhosva;

Undiponise wega.


3. Handina ‘chondounza

Ndangobata M’chinjiko;

Handina simba ndega,

Ndiwe unoyamura;

Ndauya ndinetsvina,

Ndisuke, Muponisi.


4. Ndigere pasi pano,

Napanguva yokufa,

Apo ndichaswendera

Kunewe kuzotongwa;

Dombo rakatsemurwa

Ngandivande munewe.

hymnTitle: Jesu, Lover of my soul
hymnContent:
1. JESU mudisi womweya

Nditizire mwoyo wako,

Ndiri kutya rurunziro

Runogara ruchiuya.

Ndiwanze M’ponisi wangu

Nguva yose youpenyu;

Nditungamidze munzira

Ndigashire pakuguma.

2. Ndiwe Mubatsiri wega,

Vamwe vanoshaya simba.

Usasiye ndiri ndega,

Ndisimbise ndinyaradze.

Ndinosimbira kunewe,

Ndibatsire, ndine mhosva.

Rega mapapiro ako

Andidzivirire Tenzi.


3. Ndiwe ndichaona nyasha

Dzinokwana vanyangadzi.

Ndipe mvura yokurapa,

Ndichenise kwese kwese.

Iwe tsime roupenyu

Ndimwise nesimba rako;

Ngaritubuke muneni

Zvino narini narini.

hymnTitle: Jesu, meek and gentleq
hymnContent:
1. JESU wakapfava,

Mwana waMwari

Inzwa Muponisi

Kuchema kwedu


2. Utisunungure,

Bvisa majoti,

Uparadze zvese

Zvinotibata.


3. Tipe takuteta

Kusununguka

Ngatipinde tese

Mumusha wako.


4. Ndiwe nzira yedu

Titungamidze,

Tiunze kunyika

Yoruveneko.

hymnTitle: Lord of our Life and God of our Salvation
hymnContent:
1. TENZI naMwari woupenyu hwedu,

Nyenyedzi inovenekera vanhu,

Inzwa kuchema kweSangano rako,

Mwari naMambo!


2. Sangano rako riri mudambudzo,

Mhandu dzavanhu diri kurwa naro,

Dzine mapfumo anorikuvadza.

Tenzi rirwire!



3. Tenzi, batsira pane pfumvu huru

Tenzi ponisa! Tiri kurunzirwa,

Asi Sangano haringakurirwi,

Uri M’ponisi!


4 Tenzi, batsira! Dzinga mhandu dzedu,

Dzivenekere, udzisunungure,

Utipe nadzo runyararo pasi.

Nokudengazve.

hymnTitle: The Church’s one foundation
hymnContent:
1. JESU wakaivaka

Chechi yepaiswo,

Ndiye wakaisika

Nemmvura neIzwi,

Kundoihwunaira

Akabva kudenga;

Ropa rakaitenga

Zvo akaifira.


2. Vanhu venyika dzese

Vari mairiwo,

Ina Tenzi mumweyo

Ruponiso rumwe;

Ine Zita rimwero,

Ine chidyo chimwe,

Inogashira nyasha

Mukugara kwayo.



3. Vanhu vanoishora

Dambudziko rayo,

Nokunyepa kwavanhu

Nezvitadzo zvavo;

Asi vese vatsvene

Vari kunamata,

Ndizvo kuchema kwayo

Kuchave kufara.

4 Mupfumvu dzese zhinji

Nomukurwa kwayo

Inogara zvino

Runyararo rwayo;

Dakara pakuguma

Ione kufara

Chechi yakanakisa,

Ichazororazve.

5 Inosangana zvino

NaMwari Mukuru,

Navariyo vatsvene

Vari kuzorora.

Tenzi, tipewo tsitsi,

Ndizvo pakuguma,

Tisvike pamwe navo

Tigare kudenga.

hymnTitle: Thy Kingdom come, O God
hymnContent:
1. MWARI ngahusvike

Umambo hwedenga,

Putsawo zvitadzo

Netsvimbo yedare.


2. Rugare rwakozve

Ruripi norudo?

Kunopera rini

Kutadza kwesezve?


3. Nguva yakatsidzwa

Inosvika rini

Apo zvakaipa

Zvichapera zvese?


4. Takuteta, Tenzi,

Uya une simba,

Ugutse maziso

Edu anokuda.


5. Vanhu vanoshora

Zita rinoyera,

Manyadzo avanhu

Anodzima rudo.


6. Nyika zhinji zvino

Dzigere mudima;

Buda, zuva redu,

Udzivenekere.

hymnTitle: Jesu shall reign where’er the sun
hymnContent:
1. JESU Mambo achatonga

Panyika dzese dzepasi,

Umambo hwake hukuru

Huchakura nhambwe dzese.



2. Vanhu vendudzi dzesezve

Vanotenda rudo rwake,

Mazwi avana vaduku

Anokudza Zita rake.


3. Anokomborera vanhu,

Vasungwi vanoburitswa,

Vaneta vanozorora,

Varombo vanopfumiswa.



4. Zvisikwa zvese zvepasi

Zvitunhidze Mambo wedu,

Ngerosi dziimbe nziyo,

Pasi risongane nadzo.

hymnTitle: We love the place, O God
hymnContent:
1. TENZI nzvimbo yako

Tinoidisisa,

Umba inoyera

Inofadza isu.

2. Vanhu vanouya

Kuzonamata’mo

Newe Tenzi Jesu.

Unovagashira



3. Tinodisa nzvimbo

Yokubabatidzwa,

Apo tingaone,

Zvipo zvomweyawo.

4. Tinoda Otari

Inodiwa kwazvo,

Apo tinoona,

Uri petyo nesu.

5. Tinorida izwi

Rinerunyararo

Rinotinyaradza

Mukurwa kweduwo.

6. Tinokutendera

Nyasha dzako zhinji

Tinoda kuziva

Rwiyo rwekudenga.


7. Jesu tipe tsitsi

Kukudisa pano,

Nokukunangisa

Navatsvene vako.

hymnTitle: Oh, what the joy and the glory must be
hymnContent:
1. NGATFUNGE nokufara nembiri

Misi yeSabata yavanoyera,

Uko vaneta vanaro zororo,

Vakundi vane zviremba zvembiri.


2. Mambo ndiani navakuru vake?

Inyi kufara nokufadzwa kwazvo?

Tingadise sei imi vatsvene

Mukatiudza zvese zvomunonzwa!


3. Jerusarema umo munogara

Rufaro norunyararo narini.

Umo rudiso rwese ruchagutswa, .

kwazvo Nezvikumbiro

zvese zvichapiwa

4. Hatichazooni dambudzo umo.

Tichaimba nziyo dzokudenga.

Ndizvo vatsvene vachatenderawo

Nyasha dzaTenzi nokudisa kwake.

5. Iro Sabata rigere narini

Zuva harimbobudi nokudoka

Ngerosi navatsvene vachaimba

Rwiyo rumwero nokusagumawo.

6. Isu tigere panyika yepasi

Tinochemera nyika yokudenga,

Ndudzi dzesezve dzinoneta

Dzichitsvaka iro Jerusarema.


7. Tinopfugama nokuvirikidza

Baba Musiki wezvisikwa zvese;

Jesu Mponisi wakatiponisa,

Uyo Mweya tigerezve mauri. Amen.

hymnTitle: Lord, thy Word abideth
hymnContent:
1. IZWI rako Tenzi

Rinotungamidza,

Vanoridavira

Vanovenekerwa.


2. Tine mhandu petyo,

Asi izwi rako

Riri petyo kwazvo

Rinopa kufara.


3. Dutu rikasvika

Dima mberi kwedu

Izwi rorujeko

Richadzivirira.


4. Izwi roupenyu

Rinopa rufaro

Pfuma dzokudenga

Kune vakapfava.


5. Izwi rine nyasha

Kuna vanopona

Izwi roupenyu

Kuna vari kufa.

6. Dai tichiziva

Rudzidziso rwaro

Tingakude Tenzi,

Tive petyo newe.

hymnTitle: Shepherd Divine, our wants relieve
hymnContent:
1. MWARI Mufudzi,

Tipewo mukuipa nhasi

Simba rokurinda kwazvo

Nerokunamata.


2. Pakati pokuyedzwazve

Nenhamo dzeduwo

Tipe tinamate tese

Tisingazorori.


3. Tipe kuti tinamate

Nokudavirika

Nokuchamira dakara

Tizoone Mwari.

4. Utipe kuti tigare

Tichikukumbira

Dzimara tipiwe rudo

Runopfuta kwazvo


5. Handichazokuregedzi

Dakara ndizive

Zita rakasvisikana

Rinodiwa kwazvo.


6. Tibvumidze kukuona

Tikwire kudenga

Apo tingakuringire

Nokukutunhidza.

hymnTitle: Bless’d are the pure in heart
hymnContent:
1. VATSVENE mumwoyo

Vachaona Mwari;

Mweya yavo iri musha

WoM’ponisi wavo.


2. Tenzi wakadzika

Kuunza upenyu

Anogara nokutiwa

SaMambo wavanhu.


3. Anozvipa zvino

Kuna vakatiwa

Anosarudza vatsvene

Kugara mavari.


4. Tenzi tinotsvaka

Ichi chipo chako

Tipweo mwoyo mitsvene

Umo ungagare.

hymnTitle: My God, my Father
hymnContent:
1. BABA ndiri kurasika

Ndiri kufamba mugwenga

Ndidzidzise kutaura,

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”


2. Kuti nzira ichinetsa,

Ngandirege kupopota

Ndinamate soM’ponisi;

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”


3. Kana ndiri kuchemera

Hama dzangu dzisisipo

Ngandireve nokutiwa

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”


4. Kana uchibvisa zvese

Kuneni ndezvako Tenzi

Ndinokupa zvako zvese,

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”


5. Mwoyo wangu ngaufadzwe

Ngekuuya kwoMweya,

Mwari ungaite zvese,

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”


6. Simbisa mazuva ese

Kuda kwangu ukuite

Kufananidze nokwako;

“Kuda kwako ngakuitwe.”

hymnTitle: Christian, seek not yet repose
hymnContent:
1. MUKRISTU usanete,

Inzwa Ngerosi yako,

Uri m’kati memhandu;

“Namata urinde.”


2 Hondo dzese dzedima,

Dzisingamboonekwi,

Dzinoda kukubata;

“Namata urinde.”


3. Tora mapfumo ako

Abate misi yese,

Satan anorindira;

“Namata urinde.”


4. Inzwa vakakurira

Vari kukuringisa

Ivo vese vachiti ,

“Namata urinde.”



5. Inzwa zvikuru Tenzi,

Unomudisisisa,

Chengeta izwi rake;

“Namata urinde.”


6. Rinda panguva dzese

Ndicho chiro chikuru,

Kumbira rubatsiro;

“Namata urinde.”

hymnTitle: Lead us, heavenly Father, lead us.
hymnContent:
1. BABA titungamirire

Mupfumvu dzeupenyu

Tungamira uchengete

Norubatsiro rwako;

Tinazvo zvipo zvizhinji

ZvaMwari Baba wedu.



2. Mponisi Tisunungure

Takanyorova tese;

Wakafamba pasi pano,

Ukanzwa nhamo yese;

Uchineta uchiziya,

Uchigara mugwenga.


3. Mweya uya kuna isu

Uzadze mwoyo yedu,

Norudo nezvipo zvese

Nokufara kwedizve;

Tapfumiswa zvakadai

Hatichatambudziki.

hymnTitle: Oft in danger, of in woe
hymnContent:
1. FAMBAI henyu MaKristu

Mupfumvu nedambudzo,

Kundai mhandu ngesimba

Rechingwa choupenyu



2. Fambai henyu pamberi,

Nokushinga kundorwa:

Nyindirai muna Tenzi

Nomumasimba ake.



3. Simudzai mwoyo yenyu!

Forai mwakashongedzwa

Nemademautare

A Mwari wokupenya



4. Kanai, musinganeti,

Munoimba mupengo;

Musatyeba vazhinji,

Muchakurira mhandu.



5. Fambai henyu muhondo

Muchakunda Satani;

Muchagara umambo,

Nokupiwa chiremba.

hymnTitle: Lord, her watch thy Church is keeping
hymnContent:
1. CHECHI iri kumirira

Kutonga kwako pasi;

Isu tese tinorinda

Musi woruponiso

Tumira vakohwi zvino

Mukupupura kwako.

Kusuwa kwoMuponisi

Kwakava nhando here?



2. Vazhinji vasati vanzwa

Masoko oupenyu;

Vanganzwe sei vasina

Muparidzi weIzwi?

Tenzi raura vangeri

Ngariraurwe kwese,

Nokusima ruponiso

Kumagumo epasi.



3. Pakuguma vanhu vako

Vachaungana vese.

Mambo achagara navo

Satani achasungwa.

Nzara, shungu, kufa nhamo,

Izvi zvichabva zvese

Chechi iri kumirira,

Uya Jesu, utonge.

hymnTitle: All people that on earth do dwell (1)
hymnContent:
1. FARIRAI kuna Tenzi

Vanhu vese vari pasi.

Munamatei, muuye

Pamberi pake norwiyo.



2. Munoziva, kuti Tenzi,

Wakatisika nesimba;

Iye ndiye mufudziwo

Isu tiri hwai dzake.



3. Ngatipinde Chechi yake

Nokufara nokutenda;

Tiombere titunhidze

Zita rake rinoyera.



4. Izvo Mwari akanaka,

Nyasha dzake hadzigumi,

Idi rakange riripo

Richagara nguva dzese.



5 Baba, noMukororezve

NoMweya unoutsvene,

Gashira zvitendo zvedu

Zvino napanguva dzese. Amen

.

hymnTitle: All people that on earth do dwell (2)
hymnContent:
1. MESE-MSESE vapanyika

Mumukudze Mambo wedu;

Izwi renyu ritunhidze:

Mumukudze nguva yese

Mutunhidze Ushe Hwake,

Mufarire kumukudza


2. Uyu Mambo munoziva

Ndiyeyo “Pasi Chigare” Baba,

Simba rake rakakomba,

Tese tiri danga rake;

Tinofadzwa ndiye ega:

Anodisa hwai dzake.


3. Ndizvo Mumba make umo

Ngamupindwe ndisu tese

Tipembere tifarire

Nokuzivanawo naye.

Ngaakudzwe atunhidzwe.

Zvese zvakamufanira.


4. Ushe hwake hwakakomba

Hwakagara hwakadaro,

Rudo nomutsa ndezvake.

Idi rake rakati dzii,

Harichinji napaduku

Chingo rakasondoti twi!



5. Mbiri kunewe Jehova,

Mukorore, Mweya:

Uri chishamiso kwacho

Kune vachikure newe

Ngaukudzwe naye newe

Agere pano panyika, Amen

hymnTitle: Jesu, meemk and lowly
hymnContent:
1. JESU Unoyera,

Wakazvirereka,

Ndinzwe, mwana wako,

Mukuchema kwangu.


2. Tenzi woupenyu,

Nokusimba kwako

Muchinjiko wako

Unotikwevera.


3. Tenzi wakafira

Ini munyangadzi,

Ndinokutendera

Zvandakaitirwa


4. Namaronda ako,

Nero ropa rako,

Tiponise, Tenzi,

Isu vanyangadzi.


5. Tenzi pam’chinjiko

Wakaona nhamo.

Ndinochema kwazvo,

Ndipewo rufaro.


6. Tenzi une nyasha,

Unditungamire;

Ndiwe muchengeti,

Handizorasiki.

hymnTitle: Let saints on earth in concert sing
hymnContent:
1. VATSVENE vepasi, navo

Vatsvene vakafa

Ngavaimbe pamwe vese;

Varanda vaMwari.



2. Tiri mhuri imwe tese

Kudenga nepasi;

Kana tichipatsaniswa

Nerwizi rworufu.



3. Tiri hondo imwe tese

YaMwari mukuru;

Vamwe vakabira rwizi

Tisvike kudenga



4. Vamwe vakomborerwa

Vari mukubira;

Vamwe vari kumirira

Kudaidzwa kwavo



5. Jesu iva simba redu

Pamusi wokufa,

Kuti tibireJodani

Vamwe vachi pasi.

hymnTitle: O happy band of pilgrims
hymnContent:
1. IMI Makristu mese

Muchafara kwazvo

Muchitungamirirwa

NaJesu M’ponisi.


2. Muchafara nebasa

Sezvaakaita

Muchafara nenzara

Sokutsanya kwake.


3. Muchinjiko waJesu

NeChiremba chake

Zvakatakurwa zvese

Kuponisa imi.


4 Nechibvumo chenyuzve

Tariro, norudo,

Izvi hazvikurirwi

Zviri zvipo zvake


5. Norurunziro rwese

Munhamo nenyatwa,

Izvo zvisingaperi

Dakara pakufa


6. Zvese zviri sezvipo

Zvinobva kudenga

Zvese zviri sedanho

Richasvika denga


7. Imi Makristu mese,

Farai nazvino,

Dambudziko repasi

Richava kufara.

1 Bartemeo ari bofu

Agere panzira

Jesu achipfuura’po

Navanhu vazhinji

2. Akabvunza kune vanhu,

“Ndianiko uyu?”

Vanhu voedza kuita,

Kuti anyarare

3. Jesu achiziva kwazvo

Kuna Bartemeo

Akadaidza achiti,

“Enda, uonezve.”

hymnTitle: O Jesus, I have promised
hymnContent:
1. JESU, ndakapikira

Nechipiko changu

Ndinonamata iwe

Mubatsiri wangu.

Handizotyi kukundwa

Kana uri petyo,

Nokurasika nzira

Uri mupereki.



2. Ndikunzwe petyo neni

Ndakaunganirwa:

Zviro zvokugarika

Zviri kutambudza.

Ndinotya mhandu dzangu

Dzakawanda kwese

Jesu, swendera petyo

Undidzivirire.



3. Ndizvo taura Tenzi

Nokupfava kwako.

Chikurira ruchiva

Nokuzvida kwangu.

Ndipewo simba rako,

Unditungamire

Ndiite kuti ndinzwe

Izwi rako Tenzi.



4 Ndiite nditevere

Tsoka dzako pasi.

Handina simba Tenzi

Asi rako chete.

Chitungamira zvino

Namazuva ese

Dzamara pakuguma

Ndive pamwe newe.

1. MUNE hwenje hwakakomba

Wachema mweya wangu,

Unotsvaka munyururi

Unouburitsamo.

Nhandi Jesu,

Ndinyure, ndofa here?


2. Wakadisa mweya wangu

Dzamara undifire,

Ukandiripirawo;

Kuzoti ndive wako,

Nhandi Jesu,

Ndinyure, ndofa zvangu?


3. Kururama kwandikona.

Mweya wangu watyoka

Nditumire Mweya wako

Umutse mweya wangu

Nhandi Jesu,

Ndinyure, ndofa here?


4. Ndarasika nzira yako

Ndidzore Tenzi wangu,

Izwi rako ngaripinde

Nokundiruramisa.

Nhandi, Jesu,

Ndinyure, ndofa zvangu?



5. Ndichapinda ndotandadza

Muhwenje hwakakomba;

Iva petyo undibate:

Upfuve mweya wangu

Uterame,

Uterame panewe.

hymnTitle: Hail to the Lord’s Anointed
hymnContent:
1 KUMWANA waDavid,

Nyama Changamire:

Yasvika nguva zvino

Yokukudzwa kwako:

Wazovasunungura

Avo vakasungwa;

Chibvisa kusiyana

Tonga uswature.



2. Nyika inopembera:

Ngekukunda kwake,

Vese vane rufaro

Muna Tenzi Jesu.

Nyika dzinopingudzwa

Kunzwa Izwi rake,

Vakamutenda kare

Vanondopembera.



3 Wokudzwa namadzishe

“Nyama Changamire”

Marudzi amutsvake,

NoUmambo hwake

Chavanohutendera

Hahuketi ndudzi

Hufuke nyika yose

Titongwe narini.



4. Vamambo vamarudzi

Vachaunza zvipo

Zvendarama nemura,

Kundomuombera.

Vanhu vese vepasi

Vachamutunhidza:

Umambo hunowanda;

Hugere narini.

hymnTitle: A few more years shall roll.
hymnContent:
1. KWASARA kunesu

Makore mashoma

Tisati tasanganiswa

Nehama dzakafa.

Tenzi gadzirawo

Mweya unemhosva

Ndisambe muropa rako

Ndisati ndatongwa.



2 Yasara kunesu

Nguva shomanana

Yokugara pasi pano

Tisati tatongwa


3. Yasara kunesu

Nhamo shomanana

Hakuna nhamo mumusha

Uko tichasvika.


4. Kwasara kunesu

Kurwawo nesimba

Kuita basa raMwari

Kurega zvitadzo.


5. Jesu achauya

Muponisi wedu

Wakafa kuti tipone

Tigare naiye

hymnTitle: Thine for ever, God of love
hymnContent:
1 MWARI unorudo rwese

Tiite tigare newe

Utiite vako nhasi

NoKudenga narini


2. Ndiwe Mwari Muponisi

Nzira, Idi, noUpenyu,

Titungamidze nenyasha

Kunyika yokudenga.


3. Tiri vako zvino, tipe

Kuzorora kwechokwadi

Iwe Hama noM’ponisi

Tichengete narini.


4. Tiri hwai dzako Jesu

Dzivirira isu tese:

Takarerwa newe chete

Tichaona rufaro..



5. Titungamirire, Tenzi,

Tisimbisise noMweya,

Ubvuse zvitadzo zvedu

Utipinze kudenga

hymnTitle: As pants the hart for cooling streams
hymnContent:
1. SEZVO mhembwe yatizira,

Ichidisa kunwa,

Neiyi nzira, iniwo

Ndakudisa, Tenzi.


2. Mweya wangu une nyota

Unokusuvira

Ndichakuringisa rini

NoUmwari hwako?


3. Sei ndichitambudzika

Ngandisimbirire

Ndigoimbira Mwarizve

Mambo noM’ponisi.


4. Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,

Kuno Mukorore,

Nokuna Mwari Mweya

Ndiye Munyaradzi. Amen.

hymnTitle: Hark, my soul! It is the Lord
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA wangu, inzwa Tenzi!

M’ponisi ari kureva.

Ari kutaura kuti:

“Iwe unondida here?”


2. “Ndakasunungura iwe,

Ndakarapa ronda rako,

Ndakatsvaka iwe pasi

Ndikakupa ruvheneko”


3. “Mai vangarega here

Kuchengeta Mwana wavo?

Kana mai vakarega

Ini ndinokutondera”


4. “Rudo rwangu haruperi

Rwakakura samakomo,

Rwakadzama samadziva

Rwakasimba kunge rufu”


5. “Uchaona mbiri yangu

Pakupera kohupenyu

Ugere neni kudenga .

Iwe unondida here”


6. Tenzi ndinochema kwazvo

Norudo rwangu ruduku;

Asi ndinokudisisa,

Pamidzira rudo rwangu

hymnTitle: The Head that once was crowned with thorns
hymnContent:
1. MUSORO waTenzi kare

Wakadzikwa ngeminzwa

Zvino Jesu Mukuriri

Ane zviremba zvese.


2. Nzvimbo kumusorosoro

Yakafanira iye;

Mambo wavamambo vese,

NaTenzi wavaTenzi.


3. Mufaro wavanhu vese

Vanogara Kudenga,

Muyamuri waavozve,

Vagere zvino pasi.
