4. Avo vane Muchinjiko

Wenyasha nokunyadza

Vachapiwa kufarawo

Kufara kwokudenga.


5. Vanotambudzika pasi

Vachafara kudenga

Vachaziva rudo rwake

Rwakavandika kare.


6. Muchinjiko woupenyu,

Wenhamo nowokufa

Unotipfumisa tese

Nokutikomborera.

hymnTitle: All hail the power of Jesus’ name
hymnContent:
1. SIMBA reZita raJesu

Ngarivirikidzwe;

Mupfekedzei Chiremba,

SaMambo mukuru


2. Akudzwezve ngenyenyedzi,

Musiki wezvese;

Simba ravaIsraeri;

SaMambo mukuru


3. Vamatari tunhidzai

Musimbisi wenyu;

Kotamai pamberi pake

SaMambo mukuru


4. Nemi vasarudzwi vake

Vakatsikinurwa;

Rumbidzai Muponisi;

SaMambo mukuru.


5. Hezvo umba yaDavidi

Omberai Jesu ;

Mwari wakaitwa munhu;

SaMambo mukuru


6. Vatadzi havakanganwi

Chiremba cheminzwa

Nokutonga pam’chinjiko;

SaMambo mukuru


7. VaMambo vendudzi dzese

Mugwadamirei;

Kwidzai rukudzo rwenyu

KwaMambo mukuru.

hymnTitle: Hark! hark, my soul! angelic songs are swellin
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA wangu ngaunzwe hondo huru

Dzengerosi dziri kuimbisa:

nenyanza.

Dzine masoko akanaka kwazvo

Euyo musha wakarurama.

Imi ngerosi imbisai

Munogashira vafambi vepasi.



2. Ngatiimbe dzichiri kundoimba

Kuti “Munodaidzwa naJesu”.

Kana tiri kufamba munedima

Tinonzwa zviimbo zveVangeri


3 Kare tinonzwa izwi roM’ponisi

Rinosvika panyika

Zvuru zvavanhu zviri kuremerwa

Vanouya kuna Tenzi wavo.



4 Tichawana kuzorora

Kudenga

Dima richabva, zuva ribude.

Tenzi acharipira rudaviro

MuJerusarema musha wedu

hymnTitle: How sweet the name of Jesus sounds
hymnContent:
1. CHOKWADI Zita raJesu

Rakanakisisa,

Runyararo kuMakristu,

Rinodzinga kutya.

2. Rinorapa mwoyo yavo

Mukutambudzika,

Rinoapa kuzorora

Nokudya kwomweya.


3. Zita rinodiwa kwazvo!

Rine nyasha zhinji,

Rinondidzivirirawo

Seshangu mupfumvu.


4. Jesu Muprofiti wangu

Mupristi naMambo

Ndiwe Tenzi, uri nzira,

Idi noupenyu.

5. Zvino mwoyo watonhora

Washaya kudziya

Asi, kana ndakuona

Ndichakudisisa

6. Dzamara paiyo nguva

Ndiparidze rudo,

Kunaka kweiro Zita

Kunzwike Mukufa.

hymnTitle: At the name of Jesus
hymnContent:
1. ZITA rake Jesu

Tinoombera,

Mabvi apfungame

Pamberi pake;

Ndimi dzese dzese

Ngadzitunhidze,

Mambo wedu Jesu,

Izwi raMwari.


2. Zvese zvakasikwa

Ngeizwi rake,

Hondo dzengerosi

Dzinopenyisa

Nenyenyedzi dzese

Dziri kudenga:

Zvese zvinobvuma

Musiki wazvo.



3. Wakazvirereka

Kuti apiwe

Zita rine mbiri

Ngevanyangadzi:

Wakaritakura

Risine tsvina,

Wakaridzokesa

Kubva murufu.



4. Wakaritakura

Nokutendeka

Somukundi wedu

Kum’sorosoro!

Ndiye muponisi,

Ndiye Kristuzve

Unosiomberwa

Zvino narini



5. Ngatigadze Mambo

Mumwoyo yedu

Kuti akurire

Zvitadzo zvese:

Mumuite Tenzi-

Mururunziro

Muchafungatirwa

Mukuda kwake.



6. Hama, Tenzi Jesu

Achauyazve

Nembiri yaBaba

Nengerosiwo;

Mambo wavamambo

Tinomubvuma,

Kwidzai izwi renyu

Kumuombera.

1. A! JESU wakanakisa Runako rwaMwari
Panewe woga kuripo
Kufara kwoMweya.

2. Ndinokusarudza zvino
Shamwari mudiwa Iwe uri zvese
Jesu Mambo wangu.
3. Kana ndichiona nhamo
Kana ndichifara
Muviri nomweya wangu
Ndinokupa zvese.


4. Kuti ndichiramba iwe
Ngandisuve kwazvo
Kutarisa usu hwako
Jesu Mambo wangu


5. Nduramo, Nzira, upenyu
Ndiwe muridzi wazvose
Ndinoteverawe Tenzi
Ndinokutendera.


6. Nditye ukuru hwakozve
Ndinokuterera
Nditsvage’we, ndidaidze
Narini narini. Amen.

hymnTitle: When morning gilds the skies
hymnContent:
1. NDAMUKA mangwanani Mumwoyo ndinoreva
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu. Mubasa rangu rese,
Kana muminamato:
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.


2. Dare riri kurira
Ndinonzwa uru rwiyo,
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
Ibasa rokufara,
Kuimba muchechiwo;
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.



3. Kana ndoshaya hope
Mumweya ndinoreva;
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
Apo ndinorunzirwa
Ndinoponiswa ndati;
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.



4. Mushungu nedambudzo,
Ndanyaradzwa, ngekuti
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
Satan anotya kwazvo,
Achinzwa uru rwiyo.
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
5. Kudenga vanoyera
Vanoimbisa kwazvo,
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
Pasi, denga nenyanza
Ngazvipindure kuti;
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
6. Ngatiimbise isu,
Sikati nousiku,
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.
Ngatiimbise tose,
Narini rwiyo rwedu;
Ngaatunhidzwe Jesu.

hymnTitle: Souls of men! Why will ye scatter
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA yese inotyei Sehwai dzakatyiswa? Imi masiyireiko Rudo rwedi rwaTenzi

2. Mufudzi anochengeta Hwai dzake nenyasha; Muponisi anoreva Kuti tiuye petyo
3. Nyasha dzaMwari mukuru Dzakakura senyanza Unotonga vanyangadzi Nguva dzose nomutsa

4. Tenzi anonzwa masoko Edambudzo repasi Une nyasha Muponisi Kupinda vanhu vese. 5. Muno ruponiso rwese
Muropa rake Jesu
Sezvo akasuva kwazvo
Tese tinofariswa

6. Vanhu havazivi nedi
Rudo rwaMwari wedu
Rudo rwake rwananisa
Mwoyo wake mukuru.

7. Uyaiwo kuna Jesu
Imi mese musatye.
Davirai kuti ndiye
Anotida zvikuru
8. Ngatigashire savana
Mazwi a Tenzi Jesu
Misi yose tichifara,
Tinogara naiye

hymnTitle: Lord, I hear of showers of blessing
hymnContent: 1. Ndanzwa nezvikomboreroZvadonhedzwa pasi,  Unodira zvese Tenzi,   Ngandidiridzwewo,  Kana ini kana ini   Ngandidiridziwewo 2.Usandipfuure Baba   Ndiri mwana wako; Uri kudaidza vamwe,  Ngandidaidzewo.  Kana ini kana ini Ngandidaidzewo.3.Usandipfuure, Jesu, Wakafira ini;  Urikuponisa vamwe,  Ngandiponiswewo. Kana ini kana ini  Ngandiponiswewo 4.Usandipfuure, Tenzi Mweya Unoyera; Uri kuchenura mwoyo Ngandichenurwewo. Kana ini kana ini   Ngandichenurwewo.  5.Kare, Tenzi, ndakagaraKure kune dima;Uri kuswededza vamweNgandiswenderewo.Kana ini kana ini Ngandiswenderewo6.Misi yese ndatambudzwa Nezvitadzo zvangu Vamwe vakurira newe Ngandikurirewo. Kana ini kana iniNgandikurirewo.7.Rudo, Nyasha, Simba, Tenzi Ndazvishaya zvese, Sezvo vamwe vagashira Ngandigashirewo Kana ini kana ini Ngandigashirewo.8Zvipo zvako zvinokosha Zvinobva kudenga Vamwe vafariswa nazvo, Ngandifariswewo Kana ini kana ini Ngandifariswewo.

hymnTitle: Let me come closer to thee , Jesus
hymnContent:
1. ITA ndiuye petyo, Jesu
Petyo pamisi yese.
Ita ndibate Iwe, Jesu
Murwendo rwangu rwese.

2. Ndiite ndikuone Jesu,
Soruvheneko rwedi
Ita ndireve mazwi ako
Orudo nokupfava.


3. Ndiite ndive, samatsime,
Orudo kuna vanhu
Ita undishandishe Jesu,
Kukushandira chete. .


4 Gara saMambo wangu, Jesu
Mumwoyo nomuviri.
Ndiite munhu kwaye, Jesu
Muranda wako wedi.



5. Ita ndive nenyota, Jesu
Ndive nenzara kwazvo
Nzara yokukuona. Jesu
Mumusha weZion.

hymnTitle: The King of Love my Shepherd is
hymnContent:
1. MAMBO worudo,
mufudzi Rudo,
nduramo zvese
Handizomboshai chiro
Ndiri wako narini.


2. Ninofudzwa murusvisvi
Ndichitungamirirwa.
Mweya wangu unogutswa

Nechidyo chokudenga.
3. Apo kana ndarasika
Mumukana worufu,
Tsvimbo yako nomundonzvo
Zvinogondinyaradza.


4. Mudima rokufa ndega,
Handizotyi kuipa,
Tenzi ari parutivi,
Anogondidzivira.

5. Wagadzirira tafura
Mberi kwemhandu dzangu,
Musoro wangu wazorwa,
Mukombe wazarazve.

6. Rudo rwako nomutsazve
Zvanditevera kwese.
Apo ndichiri mupenyu,
Ndiri wako narini.

hymnTitle: Anima Christi.
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA waKristu, ndiyerisewo

Muviri wake ndiponisewo
Nomweya wangu ndinoda Kristu
Muviri wangu umushandire.


2. Ropa raKristu, kumwa kutsvene.
Zadzisa mwoyo ugofarawo
Mvura inobuda parutivi
Ngaisukise zvitadzo zvangu.


3. Ndarukutika ndotsvaka simba
Panewe Jesu, uchirwadziwa
Ndotizira mumaronda ako
Ndiwo mapako, ndozovigwamo.


4. Jesu mudiwa ndinokumbira
Kusarasiwa newe narini.
Tenzi ndiwezve, handina mumwe
Chinzwa kuchema kwomwana wako.


5. Ndidzivire mupfumo raSatan’,
Apo ndichafa undidaidze.
Jesu, ngandigadzwe nengerosi
Ndichirumbidza zvino narini.

hymnTitle: Thou art the Way: by thee alone
hymnContent:
1. NDIWE wega uri nzira
Kunewe tauya,
Kana tichitsvaka Baba
Tauya kunewe.

2. Ndiwezve chokwadi wega
Ungwaru ngehwako,
Ndiwe ungaudze pfungwa
Kuchenesa mwoyo



3. Ndiwe upenyu chaihwo

Tiite tizive,
Naavo vanokudisa
Havaoni kufa

1. VAKOMANA vairi

Vababa mumwe chete

Vaisimubatsira

Kuita basa rake

2. Iye muduku oti

“Ndipewo pfuma dzangu

Ndinoda kutamira

Kune imwe nyika

3. Ndinoda kundogara

Munyika itsva zvino

Akapiwa zvakezvo

Nababa vachichema

4. Akatamira kure

Kogara zvakaipa

Zvo mari yakapera

Akada kusevenza.

5. Nepanguva yenzara

Achishaya zvokudya

Akafunga mumwoyo,

“Ndakatadza sebenzi.

6. Ngandisimuke zvino

Ndiende kunababa

Nditi handifaniri

Kuchanzi mwana wako”

7. Ndokudzoka kumusha,

Akaonwa nababa.

Baba anotizira

Kusangana nomwana.

8. Akati kuvaranda

“Unzai ngombe yedu

Kuzoti tiibaye

Nokufarira kwazvo.

9. Mukoma akasara

Ari mumunda wake

Akachinzwa kutamba,

Mumba mababa.

10. Muranda wakabvunzwa

“Ko ndiani wauya?”

Akati, kunaiye,

“Mudiki wako uya.”

11. Mukoma akasuva

Achiramba kupinda

Akati “Uyu munhu

Muparadzi kwazvo.

12 Ndizvozvo baba wake

Wakati kunaiye

“Mwana wakarasika

Zvino wazoonekwa”

13. Ngatifarise tose

Mwana wakanga afa.

Asi wadzokera

Watomuka mukufa..

14. Naye Baba wedenga

Anofarisa zvino

Kuti vanhu vatadzi

Vachipinduka kwazvo.

1. MADEKO paKapernaume

Vanhu vakauya

Navanorwara vavozve

Kurapwa naJesu.

2. Vazhinji vakaporeswa


Ngemwana waMwari

Nemweyawo wakaipa

Wakabviswa naye


3. Vazhinji vanamarwere

Vakauya vose

Zvirema namapofuwo

Nevane mapere


4. Mumwe musi muchembere

Mbuya waSimoni

Achirwara kumba kwake

Akaporeswawo.

1 Bartemeo ari bofu

Agere panzira

Jesu achipfuura’po

Navanhu vazhinji


2. Akabvunza kune vanhu,

“Ndianiko uyu?”

Vanhu voedza kuita,

Kuti anyarare


3. Jesu achiziva kwazvo

Kuna Bartemeo

Akadaidza achiti,

“Enda, uonezve.”

1. MURANDA unodikanwa

Womusoja mumwe,

Wakange ari kurwara

Akafa mitezo


2. Vakuru vakatumirwa

Nomusoja uya,

Kukumbira Tenzi Jesu

Kuuya kurapa


3. Apo Jesu akasvika,

Mukuru wezana

Wakamuchingamidza,

no Rufaro, achiti.


4. Tenzi musazvitambudza

Nokuti handina

Faniro kuti mupinde

Muumba mangu’mu.


5. Asi taurai henyu

Izwi rimwe chete;

Muranda unodikanwa

Acharapwa hake


6. Jesu achishama naye,

Norutendo rwake,

wakati,”Musoja uyu

Wakakomborerwa.”

1. Mumwe musi vadzimai nevana

vakauya kuna Tenzi Jesu.


2. Vadzimai vanomuunzira

Vacheche kuti avade vese


3. Vapostori vese vakaramba

Tenzi Jesu akatsvamwa akati,


4. “Regai vapwere kuti vauye

Vakakomborerwa vakadare”


5. Wakatora muruoko rwake

Akavabatazve somudisi.


6. Uyai, uyai, uyai kuna Jesu

Imi mose kuno Muponisi.

1. JESU akagara pasi

Pagomo apo

Akavadzidzisa vanhu

ZvaMwari. .


2. Vakakomborerwa ivo

Varombo m’mweya

Makakomborerwa imi

Vachemi


3. Vakakomborerwa vanhu

Vakapfavazve

Vakakomborerwa vese

Vanyoro.


4. Vane nzara nenyotawo

Yokururama

Onisai, mutsa, tsitsi

Kuvamwe.

5. Vakakomborerwa vane

Mwoyo muchena

Vakamborerwa

vanoNunudza


6. Vanhu vakatambudzika

M’upenyu hwavo

Nokutambudzwa pamusana

Peidi.


7. Makakomborerwa imi

Kana matukwa

Kana vachimuvengazve

Ngemafi


8. Farisai mupembere

Chipo chikuru

Ndichamugashira mese

Kudenga

9 Vanhu vese vachafara

Namazwi ake

Jesu mudzidzisi wedu

Nazvino.

hymnTitle: Thou didst leave thy throne
hymnContent:
1. WAKAREGA mbiri yako

Ngekuuya kuneni;

Wakashaya umba pasi

Pakuberekwa kwako,

Ndizvozvo uya Jesu,

Ndine nzvimbo mumwoyo.


2 Denga rese rakaimba

Muteuro waMambo

Kuzvirereka kwaMwari

Kwaoneka kunesu,

Ndizvozvo uya Jesu,

Ndine nzvimbo mumwoyo


3. Magava ane maguru

Shiri dzine zvitsaka;

Nzvimbo yoMwana waMwari

Ingwenga kuGarire!

Ndizvozvo uya Jesu,

Ndine nzvimbo mumwoyo


4. Wasvika Tenzi neIzwi

Rinoponisa vanhu

Wakatendera Kucherwa

Kusvikira Kalvari

Ndizvozvo uya Jesu

Ndine nzvimbo mumwoyo


5. Ngenguva yokuimbira

Rukundo rwako Tenzi

Ipa nzvimbo, nokuita

Ndidaidzwe kunewe

Uchiti, “Kune nzvimbo

Yako mumwoyo mangu”.

hymnTitle: Jerusalem the golden
hymnContent:
1. KUMUSHA unopenya

Kumsoro kudenga

Handina kuverenga

Zvese zvakanaka

Handisati ndaona

Zvakapinda izvi

Zita rouyo musha

I Jerusarema.


2. Mbiri ‘nonzwika uko

Rwiyo rwokutenda;

Nengerosi dziripo,

Nemboo dziripo;

Vanunudzwa ndiKristu

Neropa nokufa;

Varipo panaiye

Vaponiswa ndiye


3. Vanozorora uko

Vakakunda vese

Vaimbe nokufara

Vanamate Mwari

Vanoyera varipo

Vanomira vese,

Vasimidzwa zvichena

Vanoimba kwazvo


4. Zvese zvakarurama

Mumusha waMwari

Mwoyo yedu inoda

Kugara kudenga

Tiende uko Jesu

Tichigara newe,

NaBaba ane rudo

NaMwari Mweyawo. Amen.

hymnTitle: Praise to the Lord
hymnContent:
1. VIRIKIDZAI Tenzi wedu, Mambo wedu, Mambo wembiri,

Baba noMukorore noMweya Unoyera;

Imi vanhu

Mutunhidzei pamwe

Nengerosi navatsvene.


2. Virikidzai Tenzi unotonga kum’soro

Unokotsa kubva mumhandu dzenyu dzedima:

Hamuzivi

Nzira’yo kuda kwenyu

Kwaitwa, nenyasha dzake?


3. Virikidza Tenzi! Ngatiombere nomwoyo,

Zvisikwa zvese zvinomutunhidza nendwiyo,

Vanhu vake

Ngavaimbise, Amen,

Kumuombera narini.

hymnTitle: Rejoice to-day with one accord
hymnContent:
1. FARIRAI mese nhasi

Imbirai ngekufara:

Tunhidzai Tenzi wedu

Ngeruponiso rwake;

Paridzai rudo

Noukuru hwake

Ndiye Mwari wedu

Ane mutsa wese;

Ngatimuvirikidze


2. Apo takamuchemera

Wakanzwa mazwi edu

Davirai kunaiye

Norubatsiro rwake;

Ndwiyo dzokutenda

Mazwi edu ese

Anomutunhidza;

Ngatimuvirikidze.


3. Farirai mese nhasi

Imbirai ngekufara

Tunhidzai Tenzi wedu

Ngeruponiso rwake;

Paridzai rudo

Noukuru hwake

Ndiye Mwari wedu

Ane mutsa wese;

Ngatimuvirikidze.

1. MWARI Baba

Tinokumbira

Mwari Baba

Chipo chorudo


2. Mwari Baba

Tipeiwo

Isu vana

Chipo chorudo.


3. Rudo rwenyu

Rukuru kwazvo

Tipeiwo

Chipo chorudo


4. Rudo rwedu

Rushoma kwazvo

Tipeiwo

Chipo chorudo.

HUYA Tenzi ndinofara;

Huya nhasiMuponisi rudo rwako ngaruitwe.


Huya iwe munuri--

Ndinofara kukuona--

Ndipe zvino chipo chako--

Iwe une rudo kwazvo--

Ndizadze ngemweya wako—

1. UYAI Makristu;

Tinamate Mwari

Munanisi;

Tinamate Mwari

Munanisi

2. Timuone Jesu ----

3. Tipfugame tese—


4. Tipereke mwoyo yedu --


5. Tipembere nokufara --


6. Tigashire uyo Mwana;

Muponisi wedu

Anotida,

Muponisi wedu

Anotida.

1. Tese tibatirewo Mwari basa;

Tifare timude

Mwari Baba anotidawo

Timude tese.


2. Jesu wakatibatirawo basa---


3. Isu varanda tomuramba here?


4. Basa redu kunaMwari sandi nhando--

nokumunamata


5. Tisave noupenyu kunaMwari---


6. Fambai pasi pese muchiparidza-


7. Farai muna Kristu


8. Muchazofara naye narini---

1 BATIRAI Mwari basa;

Ngatifambe mumabasa

Ake Mwari


2 Tinopiwa tsitsi ndiye –


3 Ruveneko takapiwa ---


4. Tigare naye narini -


5. Jesu wakatipa nzira


6. Wakabvayo kunaBaba


7. Ngatiite rudo rwake

hymnTitle: Jesu, my Lord, my God, my all
hymnContent:
1. Jesu unondida ini

Ndiise mumwoyo wako,

Ndiri kutya rurunziro

Runogara ruchiuya.

Inzwa munamato wangu

Jesu Muponisi wangu.


2. Ndichengete Tenzi wangu

Nguva yese youpenyu

Nditungamidze munzira

Ndigashire pakuguma.


3. Ndiwe Mubatsiri wega,

Vamwe vanoshaya simba.

Usasiye mwana wako,

Ndisimbise, ndinyaradze.


4. Ndinosimbira kunewe

Ndibatsire ndine mhosva

Rega mapapiro ako

Andidzivirire Tenzi.


5. Ndiwe ndichawana tsitsi

Ndipe kumwa kwako kwedi;

Tsime ngarigare neni

Pasi pano nokudenga.


6 Iwe tsime rounyu

Dzinokwana vanyangadzi

Ndipe mvura yokurapwa

Ndichenise kwese kwese.

1. WAKAFIRA isu;

Gara nesu, Tenzi, nguva dzese takuteta.


2 Isu vanyangadzi ---


3 Mumba mako muno---


4 Mumatambudziko ---


5. Murufaro rwese ---


6. Apo kunosvipa ---


7. Kana tafa Tenzi ---


8. Mune iro guta---

1 Tese tiri vana vaMwari;

Ngatifare nokuita zvinofadza iye Mwari musiki


2 Ngekufara kwake kukuru

Ngatiteerere nokuita zvinofadza iye Mwari Musiki


3. Wakatisika sevadiwa ---


4 Nemhuri imwe inotenda ---


5 Rubabatidzo runoyera ---


6 Runotiita vana vedi ---


7 Ngatiedze zuva nezuva ---


8 Kufunga ngenhengo dzaTenzi ---


9 Nokunamatira vazhinji ---


10 Avo vachikunze kwedanga---

hymnTitle: Conquering kings their titles take
hymnContent:
1. VAMAMBO vepano pasi

Vanozonda vakaona

Jesu uchikudzwa wega

Nokusimbisa vako


2. Murwiri wedu mushingi

Ha’po angafane newe

Une simba rokumisa

Nokusimudzira vako.


3. Zvawakapirwa ndiJesu

Haungazviripiriba;

Nhaka yokusununguka

Wopfuurwa nayo here?

4. Kana achikudisisa

Kusekwa kunova pasi

Kana uchiurayiwa

Umukudze wakukudza


5. Akatenda kuitiwa

Shamwari yavanyangadzi

Wakanzwa kuchema kwazvo

Saka tichimutunhidza.


6. Ngaakudzwe navatsvene,

Ngerosi dairaiwo

Nayewo Baba Musiki

Nomweya Unoyerazve

Amen.

hymnTitle: Stand up, stand up for Jesus
hymnContent:
1. MIRAI makachama

Mumurwire Jesu,

Makaitiwa vake,

Musatye pakurwa

Nesimba rakakomba

Dzapfatsurwa mhandu

Dzipfugamiswe dzese

Kristu ave mambo.


2. Mirai makachama;

Simukai imi

Mufore mashongesa

Kundourayanwe

Varume munoona

Hondo mberi kwenyu,

Satan’auya chose

Mamisana naye.


3. Mirai makachama:

Simba raperasu?

Jesu wapakurira,

Hamumbopererwi.

Zvanzi chisimukai

Muchame mukurwa,

Mese wehondo yake

Fambirai mberi.


4. Mirai makachama:

Kurwa kwazopera,

Muchamutenda Jesu

A’kutusa vake

Zviremba zvinopiwa

Kumagamba ese,

Machinda nevazvare

Vagarike naye.

hymnTitle: Take up the cross, the Saviour said.
hymnContent:
1. Dzvara muchinjiko wako,

Akadaro kune vake:

Simbira kusiya nyika,

Utevere norufaro.


2. Dzvara muchinjiko wako,

Usazeze kuremerwa,

Iye anokusimbisa

Parwendo rwako kudenga.


3. Dzvara muchinjiko wako,

Usavundutswe nechiro,

Unokuratidza wega

Nzira unoenda nayo


4. Dzvara muchinjiko wako,

Udzungirire nerwendo;

Jesu akatangodzunga

Kuzokuratidza nzira.


5. Dzvara muchinjiko wako,

Kuti ukautakura,

Uchazopiwa chiremba

Munyika youpenyuyo.

1. SIMBA rako! “Mugari Narini”

Zvese zvakasikwa newe

Uri Mambo wehondo nehondo

Wakatenderedzwa nadzo.


2. Ruzivo rwako! “Pasi Chigare”

Unoziva zviro zvese

Isu zvisikwa, ruzivo rwedu

Runoperevedza kwazvo.


3. Runako rwako! “Mugari Narini”

Nemitemo yako yese

Isu tese takatsaukira

Saka tagumirwa nhasi.


4. Kuyera kwako! “Pasi Chigare

Unoyera zvinotyisa

Asi zvino unobvumira

Kuti tisvendere petyo.


5. Mutsa wako! Mugari Narini”

Unotibatsira nawo

Tichafara dai tichikupa

Upenyu hwakanakisa.

hymnTitle: I hear thy welcome voice.
hymnContent:
1 NDINONZWA Inzwi rako

Rinondidaidzira

Ndichenise zvino muropa

Redambudziko rako.

Ndinouya zvino

Tenzi wangu, Jesu:

Ndichenurise muropa

Redambudziko rako.


2. Ndinoda kukudisa

Ngemoyo woutsvene

Chenesa kwazvo mweya wangu

Ndichiri pasi pano.


3. NdiJesu anondida

Ngemwoyo woutsvene:

Nokunditungamira

Kurunyararo rwake

Rugare rwokudenga.


4. Zvitsidzo zvake zvese

Ibanza rangu ini:

Norudo rwoM’ponisi wangu

Isimba rokukunda.


5. Kwaiva, Ropa dzvene

Netsitsi dzokudenga!

Kwaiva, Jesu Tenzi wangu

Rufaro rwavatadzi!

hymnTitle: There’s a Friend for little children
hymnContent:
1. SHAMWARI wavacheche

Uriyo Kudenga,

Shamwari uno rudo

Rune simba rese;

Shamwari pasi pano

Hadzitibatsiri,

Shamwari kwaye ndiye

Kristu Tenzi wedu.


2. Zororo ravacheche

Ririyo Kudenga,

Kunaivo vanoda

Muponisi wavo;

Nzvimbo isine nyatwa

Isine zvitadzo

Vanhu vaKristu vese

Vachazorora’yo


3. Kumusha wavacheche

Kuriyo Kudenga,

Jesu anopenyisa

Uyo musha wese;

Misha yepasi pano

Haitifadziba,

Kumusha woKudenga

Vanofara kwazvo.


4. Zviremba zvavacheche

Zviriyo Kudenga,

Vanhu vese vaJesu

Vachazvigashira;

Zviremba zvichapiwa

NdiShamwari wedu

Kunavo vanomuda

Zvino pasi pano.


5. Chiimbo chavacheche

Chiriyo kudenga,

Rwiyo rusingagumi

Rwakanakisawo;

Vapwere voKudenga

Vanomuimbira

Muponisi wavana

Kristu Tenzi wavo.


6. Minanzi yavacheche

Iriyo Kudenga,

Nenguvo dzokufara,

Michindwi yembiri.

Kristu ndiye anazvo

Achavapa vana,

Tenzi ngative newe

Tikudise uko.

hymnTitle: Come, sing with holy gladness
hymnContent:
1. IMBAI nokufara

Imbisai ndwiyo,

Daidzai Hosana

Kuna Jesu Mambo;

Imbai vakomana

Ndwiyo dzenyu nhasi,

Imbai vasikana

Zviimbo zvenyuwo.


2. Vana ngavafarire

Kuimbira Kristu,

Vana ngavafarire

Kutunhidza Mambo.

Ngekuti Kristu Mwari

Wakafira vana;

Wakaunza rufaro

Nembiri, netsitsi.


3. Vakomana vaJesu

Batirai basa

M’ponisi waiveza

Nembezo netsendo.

Vasikana vaJesu

Teverai Jesu,

Mwana woMusikana

Maria Mutsvene.


4. Mumusha woKudenga

Vana vachatamba

Munzira dzendarama,

Vachafara kwazvo.

M’ponisi tipe tsitsi

Tizadze ngerudo

Kuti tisvike uko

Tigare kudenga.

hymnTitle: Who is he, in yonder stall
hymnContent:
1. NDIANI uyo mudanga’mo

Vafudzi vanoombera?

Ndiye Jesu Mambo wedenga

Ndiye Mambo wepasi pano .

Ngatimupfugamirei,


2. Ndiani uyo pane nhamo

Ari kutsanya musango?


3. Ndiani uyo anochema

Pachivumba chaRazaro


4. Ndiani anonyengetera

Mumunda weGetsemeni?


5. Ndiani uyo paM’chinjiko

Anosunungura mhandu?


6. Ndiani uyo anomuka

Mukufa kutiponisa


7. Ndiani uyo anokwira

Achikomborera vake


8. Ndiani uyo anotonga

Kumsoro muruveneko?


9. Ndiani anodzoka

Kuzotonga vanhu vese?

hymnTitle: I love to hear the story
hymnContent:
1. NDINODA iro soko

Ngerosi dzinaro

Rokuti Tenzi wedu

Wakagara pasi

Kana ndiri muduku,

Ndisinezve simba,

Ndifara kuparidza

Rudo rwake rwese.

Ndinoda iro soko

Ngerosi dzinaro

Rokuti Tenzi wedu,

Wakagara pasi


2. Iye wakambovawo

Mupewere seni

Kuti andipangidze

Nzira yavapwere;

Dai ndichitevera;

Tsoka dzake dzese

Angadai achipa

Rubatsiro rwake.


3. Kana ndisingaoni

Hope yake zvino,

Ndichaimba chiimbo

Chakanaka kwazvo

Ngekuti wakatsidza

Kuti ndiimbewo

NeVanoyera vake

Nengerosi dzake.

1. Mwari Baba wedu

Tinzwe vana vako:

Tibatsire kuti

Tikukudze zvino


2. Jesu, Mukorore

Tiponise tese:

Simba rako guru

Kupfuura Satan.


3. Mweya Unoyera,

Tinyaradze isu:

Tungamira pasi

Chechi Katorike.


4. Mambokadzi wedu

Mai Unoyera,:

Namatira isu

Nevatadzi vese.


5. Josef Muchengeti,

Wakanaka kwazvo

Utibatsirewo

Tifanane newe.

hymnTitle: Do no sinful action
hymnContent:
1. Vapwere vaTenzi

Musashatirwe,

Regai kuipa

Muri vaTenzi


2. Tenzi ane rudo

Mutsa netsitsi

Ngavamutevere

Vapwere vake


3. Hatifambi pano

Tisine mhandu

Rurunziro rwedu

Rukuru kwazvo


4. Sarudzai mese

Zviro zvaMwari

Rambai kuipa

Nezvakashata.


5. Parubabatidzo

Takatsidzisa

Kurasa Satani

Nezvakaipa.


6. Vapwere vaKristu

Jesu ndiTenzi;

Edzai ngesimba

Kumutevera.

hymnTitle: Now, my tongue, the mystery telling
hymnContent:
1. RURIMI rwangu tunhidza

Muviri une mbiri.

Naro ropa rinokosha

RaTenzi noM’ponisi,

Uyo Mwana waMaria,

Akatiparadzira.


2. Iye wakapirwa isu

Wakaberekwa pasi,

Akataura navanhu,

Akadzidzisa idi,

Dakara pakuguma kwe---

Rugaro rune tsitsi.


3. Usiku uhwo pachidyo

Navapostori vake

Jesu somutemo wavo

Akadya Paska yavo

Akazvipa kunaivo

Muchidyo chinoyera


4. Wakaita chingwa chive

Muviri wake wedi,

Wain’ive ropa rake,

Avo vanozvipiwa

Ngavadavire ngemwoyo

Uno rudo rukuru.


5. Tauya pamberi pake,

Tinokudza Sakramende

Idi riri kuoneka,

Dima rese richapera:

Rudaviro rwedu rwega

Rwatiita tirione.


6. Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba

Mbiri kunoMukorore;

Ngatikudze nhambwe dzese

Nokuvirikidza Mweya,

Unobuda kunaivo

Muuhumwe hwoUmwari. Amen.

hymnTitle: Praise, O Sion, praise thy Master
hymnContent:
1. IMBISAI vanhu vese

Tunhidzai Tenzi wedu,

Mufudzi wedu wedi

Wakatipa Sakaramende

Rinokosha romuviri

NeRopa rake redi


2. Chipo Chakakura kwazvo

Ichi chingwa cheupenyu

Kudya kwedu kweMweya;

Sezvo iye wakakupa

Kuna Vapostori vake,

Ichi chidyo chetsitsi


3. Ndizvo isu tinokudza

Tenzi wedu Jesu Kristu

Musakaramende rake

Isu tese vanhu vake

Tinofara kumuona,

Muponisi naMambo.


4. Zvino uri rutondedzo

Runova noMuteuro

WoMuponisi wedu

Ndizvo minamato yedu

Inosvika kunaBaba

NdiTenzi wedu Jesu


5. Ichi chingwa chinoyera

Chinosimbisa MaKristu

Ngeupenyu hwaTenzi.

Makristu enyika dzese,

Vadaviri vedi vese,

Vanosimbiswa ndiye.


6. Chingwa chedi chokudenga

Chidyo chedi, Muponisi,

Kudya kwomweya yedu,

Gutsa mweya yedu yese,

Tipe simba rako rese,

Dakara tikuone.

hymnTitle: O saving Victim! Opening wide
hymnContent:
1. A.! Jesu Muteuro wedu,

Unotizururira denga,

Dzinotinetsa mhandu dzedu,

Utipe zvino simba rako.


2. Ngautunhidzwe nokutendwa

Utatu uri Mwari mumwe

Utipewo upenyu hwako

Munyika yedu yokudenga.

hymnTitle: O.God unseen, yet ever near
hymnContent:
1. Mwari usingaoneki

Uri petyo nesu;

Ngatipfugame ngekutya

PaOtari yako.


2. Vanhu vako ngavazive

Zvipo zvaka pano

Mana inobva kudenga,

Rwizi rwoupenyu


3. Tauya seIzwi rako

Kuzopiwa kudya,

Muviri waTenzi wedu

Neropa rakezve


4. Tese tinzwe Izwi rako

Tiri wako Mwari;

Tifambe panzira yedu

Tapiwazve simba

hymnTitle: We pray thee, heavenly Father
hymnContent:
1. TINOKUTETA Baba

Tinzwewo ngenyasha,

Uzore vana vako

Ngekuzora kwako;

Kuti, tasunungurwa

Muzvitadzo zvese,

Tikupe ngekuchena

Muteuro wedu.


2. Tinokuteta Jesu

Titungamidzewo

Tinganatse kuuya

Iwe uri nzira;

Iwe wakatsidzira

Kubatsira isu,

Kudya kwavanoneta,

Mupi woupenyu.


3. Titangisise Mweya

Tiri vanhu vako:

Tipewo tsitsi dzako

Utivenekere;

Kuti, yakomborerwa

Mweya yedu ndiwe,

Tigashire muviri

WoM’ponisi wedu


4. Utatu Hunoyera,

Uhumwe Hukuru

Tinobatsirwa ndiwe

Ngatiuye petyo;

Hatina simba isu

Ungatisimbise,

Tasunungurwa ndiwe

Tingarege kutya.

hymnTitle: Alleluia! Sing to Jesus
hymnContent:
1. ARERUYA! Kuna Jesu

Kuna Mambo wedu.

Areruya! Mukuriri,

Une mbiri yese.

Vanhu vese ngavaimbe

Ndwiyo dzokufara,

Jesu wakatiponisa

Neropa rakewo.


2. Areruya! Hatichemi

Hatigari tega;

Areruya! Uri petyo

Tinokudavira.

Kana uchiri kudenga

Tinotondera izwi

Rechitsidzo chako kuti,

“Ndinemi narini.”


3. Areruya! Tenzi ndiwe

Chingwa chengirosi.

Areruya! Kudya kwedu

Toswendera petyo;

Tikumbirire M’ponisi

Une simba rese,

Apo vanoyera vese

Vari Kutunhidza.


4. Areruya! Unogara

Tenzi wavatenzi

Areruya! Munhu wedi

Mwana waMaria;

Ndiwe Chidyo choKudenga,

Ndiwe Muteuro,

Ndiwe Mupristi mukuru

Pasi nokudenga.


5. Areruya! Kuna Jesu

Kuna Mambo wedu.

Areruya! Mukuriri

Une mbiri yese.

Vanhu vese ngavaimbe

Ndwiyo dzokufara

Jesu wakatiponisa

Neropa rakewo.

hymnTitle: And now, O Father, mindful of the love
hymnContent:
1. TAFUNGA Baba ngerudo ruya

Rwakatitenga paMuchinjiko;

Tiripano naye Muponisi,

NdiJesu anotikumbira,

Iye Kudenga, isuwo pasi

Tinokupa pamwe Muteuro.


2. Tarisa Baba, pausu hwake

Mupristi mukuru wakozorwa,

Tiri vanyangadzi takatadza,

Tinotyiswa tega kuswendera;

Ndizvo tinopereka Mudiwa,

Tenzi uyo wakatiponisa.


3. Tinokumbirazve Iwe Mwari

Ngepamusana pehama dzedu,

Chengeta vese vakafa vedu

Ponisa avo vari mu’penyu;

Vafungatire paditi rako,

Nokuvabatsira kuchamira.


4. Ndizvozvo tauya Muponisi

Kunewe unotidisa kwazvo.

Ngeuku kudya kunotapira

Tiponise kubva zvakaipa.

Ngatifare nokusununguka,

Mukuitira basa narini.

hymnTitle: Lord, enthroned in heavenly splendour
hymnContent:
1. TENZI unogara denga

Ukamuka, Chine Mbiri

Mubatsiri wedu wega.

Uchamutsa vanhu vako.

Areruya, Areruya,

Jesu, chingwa choupenyu.


2. Hationi mbiri yako

Pano sapa Betrehema,

Asi pano sezvo uko

Unokudzwa ngengerosi.

Areruya, Areruya,

Ngatiimbe pamwe nadzo.


3. Nyenye, muteuro wako

Wakapedzwa paM’chinjiko,

Asi muteuro wako

Unogara nguva dzese.

Areruya, Areruya,

Kuti uchenure isu.


4. Mana yedu youpenyu,

Dombo rakaroverwesu;

Denga nesu, ngatikudze

Iwe wakafira isu.

Areruya, Areruya,

Mwari, Mambo, Muponisi.

hymnTitle: Bread of Heaven, on thee we feed
hymnContent:
1. CHINGWA chokudenga,

Nyama yedu yedi,

Tenzi zuva rese

Gutsa mweya yedu.

Wakafira isu,

Tipe simba rako


2. Waini yokudenga,

Ropa rakapiwa.

Tenzi tiponise

Ngemaronda ako,

Ngatiitwe nhengo

Dzomuviri wako.

hymnTitle: Just as I am, without one plea
hymnContent:
1. INI handina chiro chiduku

Asi ropa raakandipira.

Ndakadaidzwa kuti ndiuye,

Zvino ndauya.


2. Ndiri kutambudzika kazhinji

Ndiri mukurwa, ndine zitadzo

Kutya kuzhinji, kurwa kukuru.

Zvino ndauya.


3. Ndiri murombo, ndirikurwara.

Uchabatsira, uchandirapa,

Undipe zvese zvinoshaikwa.

Zvino ndauya.


4. Sezvo ndauya uchanditora,

Uchaponisa, uchachenura,

Ngekuti ini ndinodavira.

Zvino ndauya.


5. Ini handine chiro chiduku

Rudo rukuru rwakandibata.

Ndiite wako zvino narini.

Zvino ndauya.

hymnTitle: Draw nigh and take the Body of the Lord (1)
hymnContent:
1. Uyai mudye Muviri waTenzi

NeRopa akaparadzira isu.


2. Takatengwa ngeRopa noMuviri

Zvino tasimbiswa tinomutenda.


3. NgemuChinjiko neRopa rake’po

Kristu Muponisi wakakurira


4. Wakaperekerwa vanhu vese,

Iye Muteuro; Iye Mupristi.


5. Kare nyenye dzakabairwa vanhu

Mifananidzo yeChidyo chaTenzi.


6. Mukufa ndiye achaponisesu,

Nazvino anotipa tsitsi dzake.


7. Vanoyera vachachengetwa ndiye

Vachagashira upenyu kudenga


8. Nzara nenyota zvichapera zvino

NgeChingwa neWaini zvine upenyu


9. Mutongi wendudzi dzese dzepasi

Zvino unesu, ngatimuombere.

hymnTitle: Draw nigh and take the Body of the Lord (2)
hymnContent:
1. SWENDERAI mugashire

Muviri woM’ponisi

Muzorimwa ropa rake

Makatengwawo ndiro.

Areruya, Areruya,

Tinokutenda Tenzi.


2. Nyama yake inogutsa,

Tifariswe mumoyo

Timukudze Tenzi wedu

Nokumupemberera.


3. PaM’chinjiko akapiwa

Kubairwa isusu

Hezvi otigutsa nhasi

Kuti tisatye rufo.


4. Tenzi Jesu akazvipa

Kufira ndudzi dzese

Ava nhasi hwai yedu

Yokupirwa zvitadzo.


5. Kare mhuka dzaipera

Kuurairwa nhando

Nhasi tine hwai yedi

Takapihwa nedenga


6. Ndiye Gamba redu ega

Anotitungamirira

Asimbise mweya yedu

Nokudya kwokudenga.


7. Swenderai nomufaro

Muzomugwadamire

Ndiye chingwa chadzikiswa

Chine upenyu kwahwo.


8. Pano ndipo avengana

Navanhu vake kwavo

Chishuwo chese chapera.

Tinomuringisisa.


9. Vanoziya akuvapa

Chingwa chaVanoyera.

Vane nyota varikunwa

Murwizi rwoupenyu.


10. Farai mupemberere

Iye Musikavanhu

Ndiyeyo Pasichigare,

Azogara munesu

Tidaidze Areruya,

hymnTitle: Wherefore, O Father
hymnContent:
1. NDIZVOZVO Baba, isu vana vako

Takuratidza Kristu mudikani,

Chipo chako chitsvene, Muteuro wedi

Usine wara.


2 Tinomupa pamsana pavakabva;

Isu tiri munhamo nokusuva,

Asi kunadzo hama dzinodiwa

Ipa zororo.


3. Vakabaiwa mukukana kwavo

Nganga yomweya rapa maronda’vo

Bvisa zvitadzo, bvisa mawara’vo

Uvachenise.


4. Ipa rujeko, ipa kuzorora

Kusingaperi. Uvatungamire

Apo Vatsvene vanoona Iwe,

Mwari mukuru

hymnTitle: Jesus in thy dear Sacrament
hymnContent:
1. JESU, namaziso angu

Handioni Muchinjiko

Mu’ri Sakaramende rako

Rakakomborerwa kwazvo

Asi ndinoziva ngedi

Iwe wakafira ini.

Zvino Uri paOtari

Urikuperekwa apo.


2. Jesu, namaziso angu

Handioni Nyama yako

Mu’ri Sakramende rako

Rakakomborerwa kwazvo

Asi nyama yako yedi

Yakanererwesu kare,

Iri paOtari zvino

Ive kudya kwedu kwedi.


3 Jesu, namaziso angú

Handioni Ropa rako

Mu’ri Sakaramende rako

Rakakombo kwazvo

Asi Ropa rako redi

Rakaparasudzirwa isu,

Ririmumukombe zvino

Rive Kumwa kwedu kwedi.


4. Jesu, namaziso angú

Handioni Usu hwako

Mu’ri Sakaramende rako

Rakakomborerwa kwazvo

Asi hondo dzengerosi

Dzinoona Usu hwako

Hwakabaiwa ngeminzwa

Kuponisa vanyangadzi


5. Jesu, namaziso angu

Handioni Mwoyo wako

Mu’ri Sakaramende rako

Rakakomborerwa kwazvo

Asi Mwoyo wako uyo

Wakabairwesu kare

Unopfuta nekudisa

Kokutiita tiyere.


6. Jesu, iwe Mwari wangu

NoMusiki unesimba:

UMwari hwako hwavigwa

Hahuonekwi navanhu.

Asi mu’ri Sakaramende

Uri apo nomuneni ;

Mwari wedi, Munhu wedi,

Ndinokuombera zvino.

hymnTitle: Let all moral flesh keep silence
hymnContent:
1. NYARARAI, vanhu mese

Kotamai nokutya kwazvo

Musafunge nezvepasi

Izvo Kristu aswendera,

Auya kukomborera

Nokupiwa muombero.


2. Ndiye Tenzi wevaTenzi,

Mambowo wepasi pese,

Mwari wedi, munhu wedi,

Achitora nyama yedu:

Anogutsa vanhu vake

Nomuviri wake uyo.


3 Nengerosi zhinji kwazvo

Dziri kumutungamira

Uyu, ruveneko rwedi

Anouya pasi pano:

Chita chese chaSatani

Chinoparara sedima


4 Maserafi, makerubi

Anoviga hope dzavo

Areruya anoimba,

Nokuimba haaregi:

Areruya! Areruya!

Areruya, Tenzi wedi!

hymnTitle: Sweet Sacrament divine
hymnContent:
1 A! SAKARAMENDE Jesu!

Wazvirereka kwazvo:

Tauya pano zvino

Nomwoyo konamata.

A! Jesu, tinokuremedza

Nokukukudza tichiimba;

A! Sakaramende Jesu!


2. A! Sakaramende Jesu!

Rugare rwedu rwedi,

Matambudziko ese

Anonyaradzwa newe.

Tinokuudza nhamo dzedu

Nokukumbira rubatsiro;

A! Sakaramende Jesu!


3. A! sakaramende Jesu!

Ngarava yokudenga,

Tinoda kuzorora

Munewe nhambwe dzese:

Utiponise tisanyure

Munyanza yezvitadzo zvedu,

A! Sakaramende Jesu!


4. A! Sakaramende Jesu!

Rujeko rwoUmwari

Runojekesa kwazvo

Mukatikati mako:

Kupenya kwamatenga ese

Tivenekere pasi pano,

A! Sakaramende Jesu!

1. MWARI makafaranuka

Kugara saBaba,

Mukorore, muuhumwe

NoMweya wako.

Chingwa chedu, waini yedu

Ndizvo tinozvipa .

Kuna Baba unoyera,

Tichitenda kwaari.

Noupenyu hwake.


2. Ndiwe Mwari wakasika

Vanhu vese pasi

Kuti vazofare newe

Pano nokudenga.


3. Asi tese takatadza:

Hatichafaniri

Kupa chipo chedu kuna

Mwari unoyera.


4. Ndizvo Mwari anetsitsi

Akatipa chipo

Chinogashirika kwazvo

Kunaiye mbune.


5 Chipo icho takapiwa

Ndiye Mwari Baba

Mukorore Jesu Kristu,


6. Ndizvo Mwari, Baba wedu,

Hatizvisimbisi

Tichiuya kundoimba

Munamato wedu:


7. Zve, kunyange zvipo zvedu

Zvisingafaniri

Kuna Mwari, tichauya

Tichiimba rwiyo.


8. Tinoshinga kuswendera

Mwari unoyera

Pamwe chete noM’ponisi

Chipo chedu chedi.


9. Ndizvo Baba, mugashire

Zvipo zvedu pamwe

Nomuviri wakachena

Ropa raJesuzve.

1 Tenzi, Unotichengeta

Ngekudisa kwako,

Ndiwe watiunza pano

Kuzoita Misa.


2 Tibatsire, tisimbise,

Tichenure kuti

Tifarire izwi rako

Nokufarirana.


3. Mazwi evangeri rako

Ngaapinde pano,

Pasina chimwe chiro

Chingaarambidza.


4. Mazwi ako ngaapinde

M’nzeve dzedu tese.

Ngaabaye mwoyo yedu

Tikuteerere.


5 Kuti, tanzwa Izwi rimwe

Tizofananidzwa

Newe, Jesu, navazhinji

Vanogaranemi.

1 Mwari Baba, wokudenga tiponise;

Tinzwe ngekufara, vanyangadzi, vanyangadzi ndisu,

Tinzwewo ngekufara.


2 Muponisi huya pano utiponise-


3 Ngeichi chingwa, paOtari ngatiponiswe-


4 Ngeiri ropa, rinokosha tiponise-


5 Jesu iwe mwenje wedi tivenekere-


6 Tiswendere, paOtari Inoyera-


7 Tichifunga izwi guru, roruponiso-


8 Huya nhasi, Muponisi, utiponise-


9 Jesu iwe, mwenje wedi, tivenekere-


10 Munhamu dzese, naSatani tidzivirire-

hymnTitle: I am not worthy, holy Lord
hymnContent:
1 HANDIFANIRI, Tenzi Mutsvene,

Kuti mupinde mumwoyo wangu;

Taurai izwi rine nyasha,

Rinosunungura vanyangadzi.


2 Handifaniri kushanywa nemi,

Mwoyo wangu uzere marara

Haubviri nokudongorera

Reva zvako izwi ndinorapwa.


3. Handimbofaniri; asi Tenzi

Zvandinyadza kukumisa panze

Wanga waisvondirongedzera

Kudya kwako kuzere upenyu.


4. Uya hako Tenzi ndingadini

Nditodyawo kudya kunoyera

Ndaichema zvinosirisa

Zvino mweya wangu chipembera.

1 JESUS Zita rako

Rinondifarisa.

Mwana waMaria,

Muponisi wangu,

Sakaramende rako `

Rinondibatsira.


2. NgeUmwari hwako

Ndisimbise, Tenzi,

PaOtari yako

MuUmwari hwako

Ndinokuombera

Mwana waMaria.

hymnTitle: In token that thou shalt not fear
hymnContent:
1 TAKUNEMBA! Usatyeba

M’chinjilo waKristu;

Takunemba noM’chinjiko

Kuti uve wake.


2 Takunemba! Usatyeba

Kudada neZita.

Tanemba pahumo yako

Muchinjiko wake.


3. Takunemba! Usarambe

Kukanira Kristu,

Mira pamureza wake

Ngesimba norudo.


4. Takunemba! Uchafamba

Nzira yavatsvene;

Uchatora Muchinjiko,

Ugare Kudenga.


5 Ndizvozvo, panze, pachena

Takunemba nhasi.

Huma ine Muchinjiko

Ichapiwa mbiri.

hymnTitle: ‘Tis done! That new and heavenly birth
hymnContent:
1 KWAITWA! Kubarwa patsva

Kwamusuka mhosva yake,

Kuchiita mweya mumwe

Usunungurwe ndiTenzi.


2 Imi maunza mupwere

Mumanja oMuponisi,

Garai muchichengeta

Uyu mupwere waMwari.


3. Mudzidzisei kudisa

Zvinodikanwa ndiMwari,

Azive rudo rwaJesu,

Norugaro rwoMweya.


4. Basa renyu rakanaka

Richiripirwa kudenga,

Muchisongana nomwana

Nokupiwa umambo zve.


5. Tunhidzai Mwari wedu;

Zvisikwa mutunhidzei;

Mutunhidzei ngerosi,

Baba, Mwana, noMweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: I was made a Christian
hymnContent:
1. NDAKABABATIDZWA

Ndakapiwa zita

Kuve mwana wako

Wenhaka yako

Muzita raKristu

Ndochirumbidza

Ndichindoyeuka

Chitsidzo changu.


2. Ndinzvenge kuipa

SoMukristuzve.

Jesu, zuva rese

Ndimushandire

Ndiri muukristu

Ndi’mbire Tenzi

Nditsvake yamuro

Ndikotse mhiko.


3. Chikomborero’cho

Ndinochichema

Muombero, basa

Mukuyeriswa

Baba, Mwana, Mweya

Ndipei tsitsi

Ndigare mu’kristu

Ndivigwe newe.

hymnTitle: My God, accept my heart this day
hymnContent:
1 NHASI Tenzi ndinokupa

Mwoyo wangu wese,

Ndipe simba rokufamba

Ndisingavunduki.


2 Ndipfungame ndinamate

Kunewe Musiki,

Ndipe simba ndizvikunde

Zvirunziro zvese.


3 Dira, dira, dira, Tenzi

Mweya wokumsoro;

Ndibatise pfuma yako

Isingapfuuri.


4 Ngazvirambe zvindipfuwe:

Ndiswendedzwe petyo,

Ndikukudze ndakapfunya

Ndiri petyo newe.


5. Ndipe ndikuvimbisise

Ndichipano pasi,

Ndimhanyire norufaro

Wa’kundidaidza.


6. Zvese ndinoshanda pano

Zvikufadze Tenzi,

Zvindipewo namanyemwe

Ekudiwa newe


7. Ndinyatse kuswenderesa

Nditsigirwe newe,

Ndive uchapupu hwako

Kuvatsva munewe.


8. Kuzoti ndapereverwa

Nezvepano zvese,

Unditore zvako Jesu

Ndigare kunewe.

hymnTitle: How welcome was the call
hymnContent:
1 KUFARAI uko!

Vanhu vakaita,

Apo Jesu akauya

Kumusha weKana.


2. Musvitsa mukwambo

Vakafara vese,

Izvo Tenzi akadzinga

Nhamo yakaipa.


3 Zvirongo zvakanzwa

Simba rake guru;

Varanda vakachera wain

Vachishama kwazvo.


4. Tenzi woupenyu

Uya pano nhasi

Utipe chikomborero

Chisingazoperi


5. Pfumisa mukwambo

Nomusvitsa wake

Neropa’ro rakabuda

Parutivi rwako


6. PaOtari yako

Tinonamatazve

Sezvo wakakumbanidza

Vakotse narini.

hymnTitle: The Voice that breathed o’er Eden
hymnContent:
1 IZWI rakasifema

Mumunda weEden,

Pam’chato wokutanga

Richikundofema.


2 Sanganisano dzvene

Ravanhu Vakristu,

Utatu huchive’po

Kuti huvasunge.


3 Ne’yi micheka yako

Iwe, rudo, vana,

Zvakaisvovandika

Zvisingadimbuki.


4. Swendera pano Baba

Upe uyu m’svitsa

Kune murume wake

Kuti vave mumwe.


5. Swendera Mukorore

Uvasike patsva

Mune upenyu hutsva

Wavasanganisa.


6. Swendera iwe Mweya

Uvakomborere

Sesangano rimwe

Musvitsa waKristu.


7. Pasi pamapapiro

Omweya Mutsvene;

Vakatanga rwendo rwavo

PaOtari yako.


8. Vaperekedze Baba,

Muupenyu hwavo

Dakara vachisvika

Kumusha kudenga

hymnTitle: Day of wrath
hymnContent:
1 MUSI wokusuva kwazvo

Uyo takaudzwa kare

Zviro zvese zvichapiswa.


2 Vanhu vari kutya kwazvo,

Apo Tenzi anouya

Kuzotonga vanyangadzi.


3 Tsuri iri kudaidza

Mumakuva avakafa

Ichimutsa vanhu vese.


4 Vese vari kutenheka

Pasi rese richamuka

Richipindura Mutongi.


5 Ona, tsamba yoMutongi!

Zviro zvese zvakanembwa

Isu tichatongwa ndizvo.


6 Anouya kuzotonga

Hachivigwi chimwe chiro,

Zvese zvichazivikana.


7. Ini munyangadzi kwazvo

Ndichafadza Tenzi sei,

Kuti vese varikutya?


8. Mwari umambo hwese

Iwe wakatiponisa,

Tibatsire vanyangadzi.


9. Funga Jesu, Muponisi,

Iwe wakauya pasi

Kundibvisa muGehena.


10. Nhamo yako inokosha

Yakatenga vanyangadzi

Yakaitwa nhando here?


11. Tipe kuti mweya yedu

Icheniswe neRopa’ro

Isu tisatitatongwa.


12. Ndinochema nokubvuma

Mhosva nezvitadzo zvangu

Ndiponise, ndibatsire.



13. Iwe wakasunungura

Mbavha iri paM’chinjiko

Nomukadzi wakaipa.


14. Handigoni kunamata

Handigoni kupinduka

Asi Tenzi ndiponise.


15. Ndiise mudanga redi

Rine hwayi dzakanaka

Usandirase nembudzi.


16 Apo vanhu vakaipa

Vanopinda muGehena

Ndidaidze navatsvene .


17. Ona ndirikupfugama

Ona ndinosuva kwazvo

Ndiponise munyangadzi.


18. Musi wokuchema kwazvo

Vanhu vari kudaidzwa

Vanouya kuzotongwa.


19. Vaponise Tenzi Mwari.

Jesu Tenzi une nyasha

Vape runyararo rwako.

hymnTitle: Praise, O praise our God and King
hymnContent:
1 TENDAI Mwari Mambo

Mukudzei ngendwiyo;

Mutsa wake mukuru

Unogara narini.


2 Mutenderei zuva

Rinopenya kudenga;


3 Nomwedzi unopenya

Nokuchena usiku;


4 Mutenderei mvura

Inokurisa njera;

5. Mwari wakapa minda

Ibereke michero;


6. Mutenderei zvipo

Zvokupupura kwedu;


7. NeChidyo Chinoyera

Chitsidzo chokudenga;


8. Mbiri kuno Musiki

Mambo wepfuma dzese;

Mbiri kuno Utatu,

Baba, Mwana, noMweya. Amen.

hymnTitle: We plough the fields and scatter
hymnContent:
1 TINORIMA tidyare

Mbesa dzedu muvu,

Asi dzinodiridzwa

NdiMwari mukuru;

Anotumira mvura,

Nguva yokudziya.

Mhepo zvese nezuva

Zvinodzikurisa.

Zvipo zvese pano

Zvinobva kumsoro;

Tendai Tenzi pamsana

Rudo rwake.


2. Iye ndiye Musiki

Wazvo zviro zvese,

Anosika maruva,

Anotonga zuva,

Mwedzi, mhepo nenyanza,

Shiri dzinorerwa;

Asi zvikuru isu

Tinopiwa kudya.


3. Tinotendera Baba

Zvese zvakanaka.

Mbeu nokupupura,

Upenyu nokudya.

Ngatipe zvipo zvedu

Zvokutenda kwedu,

Asi zvikuru kwazvo

Ngatipe zvomwoyo.

hymnTitle: The sower went forth sowing
hymnContent:
1 MUDYARI wandodyara

Mbeu pasi muvu;

Dzinogara mazuva,

Tsuri dzinobuda.

Dzakuriswa nezuva,

Mvura inokudza,

Michero inoibva

Kukohwa kwasvika.

Ngatitende mudyari

Anotipa mbeu;

Anodiridza mbeu

Anodziwandisa.


2. Ona Mudyari mumwe

Wakabairwesu,

Arikudyara mbeu

Izwi roupenyu.

Sangano riri munda

Mweya yedu ivu;

Mwari ngaafadziswe

Apo anokohwa.


3. Mumwe musi Mudyari

Achakohwa mbesa

Achauya nesimba

Navapwere vake.

Ndipo anourutsa

Hundi muzviyomo,

Achazopisa hundi

Nomwoto narini.

Mudyari unoyera

Uchava nomutsa

Pamusi wokutongwa

Ungatiponise.

1 TENDAI Mwari

Watipa mbesa

Gore rinozve

Ngekufara.


2 Mutsa waMwari

Mukuru kwazvo

Anotidisa

Ngekufara.


3. Tendai Mwari

Ngemvura yake

Yakanakisa

Ngekufara.


4. Tendai Mwari

Ngezviro zvese

Zvinokurisa

Mbesa dzedu.


5. Tinomutenda

‘Mwi Mwari wedu

Watipa mbesa

Gore rino.

hymnTitle: The eternal gifts of Christ the King.
hymnContent:
1. NGATIKUDZE Vapostori,

Vari zvipo zvoM’ponisi.

Ngatitende Mwari tese

Nezviimbo zvokufara


2. Ndivo vashe veSangano

Vakakunda mhandu dzavo;

Ndivo hondo yokudenga,

Vakavenekera pasi.


3. Rudaviro rune simmba

Banza risingakurirwi

Rudo rwese kuna Kristu.

Neizvi vakakurira.


4. Vakaonisa ukuru

HwaBaba; vakaonisa

Ruso rwoM’ponisi wedu,

NoMweya Unoyera.


5. Takuteta Muponisi

Utisanganise isu

Varanda vako naivo

Apo vagere kudenga.

hymnTitle: Captains of the saintly band
hymnContent:
1. MACHINDA avatsvene

Makapenyisa pasi,

Munogara naJesu

Kutonga vanhu vake.


2. Kupenya kweVangeri

Makauyisa pasi;

Kuipa kwakadzingwa

Zuva rakabudazve.


3. Handi nesimba ravo,

Handi namazwi avo,

Asi noMuchinjiko

Vakakurira vanhu.


4. Pakare rakasungwa

NdiSatan’ pasi rese

Zvino rinoponiswa

Nokuombera Mwari.


5. Pasi ririkuimba

Kunemi Vapostori,

Imi makaraura

Masoko okudenga.


6. Tinokukudza Mwari

Unogara narini;

Wakatibvisa tese

Musimba rezvitadzo.

1. VANOYERA kunaMwari;

Vapostori vachaimba rwiyo rumwe

runofadza ndivo vashe kunaMwari

Mambo wavatsvene.


2. Vanogara nekufara -


3. Vachikudza Mwri Baba -


4. Vachifara nokufara -


5. Mwoyo yavo yakachena -


6. Ndivo vakakomborerwa -


7. Ndivo vashe vokundenga -


8. Ndizvo tinovakumbira -


9. Rubatsiro kunaivo -


10. Kuti tizive nzirayo -

hymnTitle: Blessed feasts of blessed Martyrs
hymnContent:
1. NGUVA yakakomborerwa

Misi yavatsvene,

Tatondera Vamatari,

Tafarira vese.


2. Vakaita zvishamiso,

Vakava nesimba,

Isu ngativirikidze

Zvino, nhambwe dzese.


3. Vakava noRudaviro,

Tariro noRudo;

Vakashora mwoto, Pfumo

Vasingatyi kufa.


4. Kufa, guva zvakapera

Zvino vakapiwa

Tuso ravo navatsvene,

Nengerosi dzese.


5. Zvino vanogara zvavo

Vachiona Tenzi,

Varikutikumbira

Tsitsi dzokukunda.


6. Kurwa kwedu kuchapera

Basa richaguma

Tese ngetikudze Mwari

Navatsvene vese

hymnTitle: Let our choir new anthems raise
hymnContent:
1. IMBIRAI mese,

Farirai kuti

Nhamo dzakatandwa

Kuna Vamatari.

Mbiri yokudenga

Vagashira nhasi,

Nhamo dzakapera,

Vanofara vese.


2. Vakashinga vese

Mukutambudzika.

Mahwe, pfumo mwoto,

Mahwe, pfumo mwoto,

Havasakazvitya;

Rurunziro rwese

Rwakakundwa ndivo,

Rudaviro rwavo

Rwawanisa Tenzi.


3. Vakaona nyika

Ine mbiri yese

Apo vakuriri

Vanomira zvino.

Kunyika’yo, hama,

Ngativatevere;

Takurira isu,

Tizofara navo.

hymnTitle: Jesu, the Virgins’ crown
hymnContent:
1. JESU, ndiye chiremba

Chemhandara kudenga,

Wakabarwa ndimai

Mhandara inoyera.


2. Mhandara zhinji zvino

Dzinofara Kudenga;

Vasvitsa vakachena

Vatenderedza Nyenye.


3. Dzagarika mumbiri;

Dzichipembera kwazvo

Dzine zvipo zvitsvene;

Dzagarikiswa naye.


4. Tipewo tsitsi, Jesu,

Mumwoyo tichenurwe,

Isu varanda vako,

Tigare savatsvene.


5. Mbiri kunewe Baba,

Nokuno Mukorore

Kunewe Munyaradzi

Narini, Mwari mumwe. Amen.

hymnTitle: How bright these glorious spirits shine
hymnContent:
1. MWEYA ine mbiri yese,

Iri kupenyisa.

Zvino iri mukufara,

Yakasvika sei?


2. Ndivo vabva mudambudzo,

Vakabvuma Kristu,

Vakasuka nguvo dzavo

Muropa rakezve.


3. Uko vese vanomira

Mberi kweChigaro.

Vanokudza Mwari wavo,

Vane mbiri zhinji.


4. Nzara, nyota, nhamo dzese

Zvino dzakapera.

Masodzi akaomiswa

Ndiye Muponisi.


5. Vanovenekerwa zvino

NoM’ponisi wavo.

Nyenye inovachengeta

Ichifamba navo.


6. Zvino vakapiwa vese

Kudya kwoKudenga;

Nyota yavo yakapedzwa

Nemvura chaiyo.


7. Mbiri kuna Mwari Baba,

Kuno Mukorore

Kuno Mweya Unoyera

Zvino, nhambwe dzese. Amen.

1. VANOTAMBUDZWA vakomborerwa, ndivashe kudenga.

Vanogarika saiye Jesu Mambo.


2. Varombo vanozokomborerwa, umambo ngehwavo -


3. Vanochema vachakomborerwa, zvo vachanyaradzwa -


4. Vanochenisa mwoyo yavo, vachaona Mwari -


5. Vonokumbira vanozopiwa, zvipo zvokudenga -


6. Vanogumira zambara ngedi, vanozururirwa -


7. Vanotakura joko raTenzi, rinorema kwazvo -


8. Vese vanouya kunaTenzi, vachimutevera –
